3222790.name: hide-halterneck
3222790.description: Statistically identical to the burlap shirt in spite of its provocative display of the skin.

14241751.name: fire-arrow
14241751.description:
Low-velocity high-damage equivalent to the wooden arrows. Emits a fiery area of effect near its point of impact which will damage and slow anyone in its radius. In combat this can deny both a push and a retreat.

As a raid tool it's faster and quieter than the eoka. Unlike the flamethrower, the fire it spreads won't damage structures.

15388698.name: stone-barricade
15388698.description:
The Stone Barricade is a deployable building component. It is the cheapest, weakest and smallest of barricades. They are slightly less than the width of a foundation and slightly higher than a crouching player.

Due to its low height, barricades are usually placed on higher ground than the opponent. Examples of usage include the top of a hill, roofs and towers. High External Walls take their intended use during combat.

20489901.name: purple-sunglasses
20489901.description: Sunglasses - Gained from Rust's first Twitch drop event.

21402876.name: burlap-gloves
21402876.description: The Burlap gloves are the first of the 3 gloves as they are the only ones that can be crafted right when you start. They quickly become obsolete when finding new gloves but they are a good investment before that time.

23352662.name: large-banner-hanging
23352662.description: A large banner hanging on a wall.

23391694.name: bunny-hat
23391694.description: A silly Bunny Hat with wobbly ears to celebrate Easter 2021

28201841.name: m39-rifle
28201841.description: The M39 Rifle is the uncraftable military-grade equivalent to the Semi-Auto Rifle. Offers a higher magazine capacity, higher damage, and better accuracy. Its downsides are its slightly lower rate of fire and its rarity. It can cover a wider range of roles thanks to the superior stats it has.

37122747.name: green-keycard
37122747.description:
The Green Keycard is a game object required in order to access a some monument puzzles.
It can be obtained by killing and looting scientists and can be found on desk in Abandoned Cabins, Abandoned Supermarket, Ferry Terminal, Junkyard, Lighthouse, Oxum's Gas Station, Underwater Lab and by completing Power Plant's monument puzzle.

List of monuments that require Green Keycard to finish monument puzzle:
Airfield, Harbors, Launch Site, Military Tunnels, Power Plant, Satellite Dish and Sewer Branch.

39600618.name: microphone-stand
39600618.description: A powered microphone that lets you broadcast your voice. Press [+attack2] to change voice mode between high and low pitch.

51984655.name: incendiary-pistol-bullet
51984655.description: Slower, slightly more effective pistol bullet that also deals fire damage. Useful against Heavy Plate armor.

60528587.name: roadsign-horse-armor
60528587.description: A set of roadsign armor for a horse

62577426.name: photograph
62577426.description: A photograph taken with an instant camera.

69511070.name: metal-fragments
69511070.description: Metal Fragments. Smelted from Metal Ore, used in lots of different crafting recipes.

73681876.name: tech-trash
73681876.description: Tech Trash is an essential component in Timed Explosive Charges and weapon attachments. Tech Trash can be gained via military crates or the recycler.

86840834.name: nvgm-scientist-suit
86840834.description: A hazmat suit made from radiation resistant rubber.

95950017.name: metal-pipe
95950017.description: Pipes are a relatively common component that are used for guns, salvaged tools, and rocket launchers and rockets. They can be somewhat abundant early game until you find the need to craft rockets, and then get consumed very quickly.

98508942.name: xxl-picture-frame
98508942.description: The XXL Picture Frame is a very large canvas that allows players to draw artistic paintings and drawings onto. It can be placed on walls and some other surfaces. Can be locked from other players editing it.

99588025.name: high-external-wooden-wall
99588025.description:
The High External Wooden Wall is a deployable building object used to wall off an area. The high external is about the height and width of a standard 2x2 wall. The wall also comes with a barbed wire top slowing down and damaging any players that come into contact with it.

High externals can be a cheap and effective way to deny entry, however they decay fairly quickly and need to be maintained.

Due to their size High External Walls are often used in combat as deployable cover.

106959911.name: light-frankenstein-legs
106959911.description:
Slightly faster, slightly weaker.

Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

121049755.name: tall-picture-frame
121049755.description: A tall canvas for artists paintings.

122783240.name: black-berry-clone
122783240.description: A clipping of a Black Berry Plant.

140006625.name: ptz-cctv-camera
140006625.description: A CCTV Camera system can be used for realtime surveillance and security when paired with the Computer Station. This camera has pan, tilt, and zoom capability.

170758448.name: cockpit-with-engine-vehicle-module
170758448.description: Single module cockpit for a driver and one passenger, with a small engine.

171931394.name: stone-pickaxe
171931394.description: Primitive tool used for harvesting Stone, Metal ore and Sulfur ore. Can also be used to harvest animals due to its relatively high harvest rate, and contrary to popular belief, it is more efficient than the stone hatchet.

174866732.name: 16x-zoom-scope
174866732.description: The 16x Zoom Scope is a military-grade telescopic sight. Its reticle is a thin cross with bullet-drop guides. Its extreme magnification allows for precise fire over extreme distances, but its narrow field of view makes it impractical for any close quarter engagements or full-auto fire. As it's susceptible to shaking, consider using a Weapon Lasersight or Tactical Gloves in addition to this scope.

176787552.name: rifle-body
176787552.description: A rare component which is used for crafting late-game rifles. It can only be found in military and elite crates.

177226991.name: scarecrow
177226991.description:
The Scarecrow item was added as a unique item store purchase during the 2017 Halloween event alongside other unique skins and items.

The Scarecrow has no use in-game but can be placed down on the terrain.

190184021.name: kayak
190184021.description: An improvised wooden kayak. Seats two and requires a Paddle to operate.

196700171.name: hide-vest
196700171.description: While the hide vest is superior to the burlap shirt at deflecting animal attacks, the difference is hardly significant enough to entice players into prioritizing it.

198438816.name: vending-machine
198438816.description:
The Vending Machine provides a safe way to make indirect trade with other players. Anyone who has access to the rear side of the Vending Machine can edit the machine's Buy/Sell orders and modify the contents. Once a Buy/Sell order has been set up, players simply need to walk up to the front of the machine and interact with it. A list of trades will appear on their screen and (provided they have the right materials to complete the transaction) can choose a trade. The process is automatic and requires little to no management (after the orders have been setup).

Selling high valued items could make you more of a raid target, and although players can't get the machine's contents without access to the rear side of the machine, having a shop inside your base is risky. Vending Machines can also be used to lure in unsuspecting buyers into a trap base.

200773292.name: hammer
200773292.description: A tool used for rotating, repairing, and upgrading parts of structures. It can also be used to pick up certain deployable items.

204391461.name: coal-:(
204391461.description: Coal can only be obtained from stockings and presents during Christmas time. It has no other uses aside from recycling and filling people's inventory with them.

209218760.name: head-bag
209218760.description: A sack containing the head of a defeated foe. Can be added to trophies.

215754713.name: bone-arrow
215754713.description: A slower, less damaging arrow that is easier to hit people with.

223891266.name: t-shirt
223891266.description: Same resistances as longsleeve t-shirt while being nowhere near as common.

237239288.name: pants
237239288.description: As the best available clothing for the legs the pants are a must-research.

240752557.name: tall-weapon-rack
240752557.description: Artfully display your arsenal with a handcrafted wall-mounted weapon rack.

254522515.name: large-medkit
254522515.description:
The Large Medkit is medical supplies that stops bleeding when used, provides 10 instant health and heals to max health overtime. You can use the Large Medkit by pressing it on your Inventory and click the Use button or move it to your toolbar and press the slot key to use. It does not have an Use animation so bleeding can be stopped immediately.

As of July 2021, the Large Medkit can revive you with a chance of 100% while in Wounded state, it must be placed in your toolbar to be consumed. Your revival chance also depends on your Hunger and Hydration status, if both are full, they will give a total of 40% chance to revive you.

261913429.name: white-volcano-firework
261913429.description: Emits a beautiful shower of white sparks

263834859.name: basic-scrap-tea
263834859.description: A tea that increases the amount of scrap you receive from barrels.

271048478.name: rat-mask
271048478.description: A Beautifully crafted bronze and gold Rat mask to celebrate the 2020 Lunar New Year

273172220.name: plumber's-trumpet
273172220.description: Toot your own horn with this brassy improvised Trumpet.

273951840.name: scarecrow-suit
273951840.description: An item that can only be spawned in the console menu by admins. Currently the icon appears to be a wetsuit but when it is on a character it will be the scarecrow NPC costume from the Halloween event.

282103175.name: giant-lollipop-decor
282103175.description: Get into the holiday spirit with these decorative giant lollipops.

286193827.name: pickles
286193827.description: Pickles are edible food. However, you have a chance of getting your hunger and hydration decreased (you'll hear a vomit sound). It is recommended you save up pickles to feed horses, use as a bait for fish traps or compost for fertilizers.

286648290.name: disco-floor
286648290.description: A vibrant flashing floor that pulses in time to music.

296519935.name: diving-fins
296519935.description: The diving fins are flippers that make you walk slow on land and swim a lot faster. They have no protection stats so only use them for swimming.

304481038.name: flare
304481038.description:
Flare can be thrown on the ground to emit red light with large radius. Can be useful in darker areas. However, this can bring enemies to you as the red light is visible from far away.

Can be recycled for gunpowder.

317398316.name: high-quality-metal
317398316.description: High Quality Metal is considered as a rare resource used for crafting metal items such as armor, doors, weapons and more. High Quality Metal is often used as the 'top-tier' when constructing or upgrading building blocks.

342438846.name: anchovy
342438846.description: A small bony fish commonly found in large schools.

343045591.name: mlrs-aiming-module
343045591.description: The MLRS Aiming Module is a required item to use the MLRS, it can only be found in Locked Crates considering the power of the MLRS. After using the MLRS, the aiming module gets consumed.

352130972.name: rotten-apple
352130972.description: A rotten apple. Eating it currently provides a tiny boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

352321488.name: sunglasses
352321488.description: A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!

352499047.name: shotgun-trap
352499047.description: An entry-level turret crafted from easy to acquire components and resources. Activated by anyone within it's line of sight that does not have building privilege. Loaded with handmade shells, and can fire them independently without player intervention. Handy for protecting airlocks, or trap bases.

359723196.name: chippy-arcade-game
359723196.description:
A craftable arcade machine that can play games.

Currently it can play 1 game that is a contribution of another one of facepunches games known as 'Chippy'

You play through a retro style of the game while getting a highscore.

363163265.name: hose-tool
363163265.description: A tool used to make fluid connections between objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle, then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection.

390728933.name: yellow-berry-clone
390728933.description: A clipping of a Yellow Berry Plant.

418081930.name: wood-chestplate
418081930.description: Though the component cost may delay its acquisition by fresh players, those fortunate enough to utilize this armor will be satisfied by its ability to shrug off melee attacks.

442289265.name: holosight
442289265.description: The Holosight is a craftable alternative to standard weapon iron sights. Its reticle is a bright red holographic bullseye which also glows in the dark, making it the best scope for night-time combat. Thanks to its slight magnification, it can provide a greater degree of accuracy to any ranged weapon without sacrificing recoil control or close-quarter capabilities. It's especially useful if barrel attachments obscure the weapon's original sights, such as the Silencer.

442886268.name: rocket-launcher
442886268.description: The Rocket Launcher is a utility weapon which is primarily used for raiding and base defense. It fires a single rocket at a time and must be reloaded between uses. When loaded with regular Rockets, it can be utilized as an end-game raiding tool, capable of damaging multiple building parts at once. If loaded with Incendiary Rockets, the Rocket Launcher may be used as an area denial tool to spread fire to an area to prevent movement through it. Regular rockets or High Velocity Rockets may also be used as an efficient, but expensive, weapon to be used against players, as its high damage usually means an instant kill.

443432036.name: fluid-switch-&-pump
443432036.description: A simple switch that enables fluid to pass through. Can be switched on/off manually or via electricity. Can also pump water upwards to higher entities when powered.

446206234.name: torch-holder
446206234.description: A wall mounted holder for torches.

476066818.name: cassette-long
476066818.description: A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 30s of audio.

479143914.name: gears
479143914.description:
Gears are used in the crafting of various desirable (building) supplies involved in base defense, such as traps, gates, and first and foremost armored & garage doors, which are significantly stronger than sheet metal doors.

These are hard to come by in large quantities and are one of the more sought after items in the game.

479292118.name: large-loot-bag
479292118.description: A massive haul. Contains the best halloween loot

492357192.name: rand-switch
492357192.description: This switch will allow passthrough based on a random number. Each time the 'Set' input receives power it will roll true or false to allow passthrough.

524678627.name: advanced-scrap-tea
524678627.description: A tea that increases the amount of scrap you receive from barrels.

528668503.name: flame-turret
528668503.description:
The flame turret is a unique item that is difficult to find many applications for. It mostly finds it's way into 'trap bases', where a player is locked in a tight space and is burnt to a crisp by this monster.

It functions similarly to an Auto-Turret, activating only when a player without building privilege wanders in front of it. It then rotates rapidly, spewing a wall of flame in about a 30 angle in the general direction of the target until the target is dead or gone.

The flame turret is fueled by low grade fuel, and has a relatively short range to it's flames. Thus, this is a trap that requires a fair bit of planning for you to make good use of, but can be a powerful ally if you do.

553270375.name: large-rechargeable-battery
553270375.description: A Large Rechargable Battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.

559147458.name: survival-fish-trap
559147458.description: Fish traps are a great source of Food, Animal Fat, and Bones during the early and midgame. After placing bait into the trap's inventory, either small fish or trout will be caught, depending on the total calorie value of the bait in the trap. Multiple pieces of bait can be consumed at once if it means catching larger fish. Fish traps lose 10 durability whenever they catch a fish.

567235583.name: 8x-zoom-scope
567235583.description: The 8x Zoom Scope is a hand-crafted telescopic sight. Its reticle is simply a thin cross. Its magnification allows for greater precision over long ranges and extending most weapon's range, but is not ideal for close quarter engagements.

567871954.name: secret-lab-chair
567871954.description: A luxurious, comfortable chair for long sessions of CCTV watching.

573676040.name: coffin
573676040.description: An old wooden coffin, can store up to 42 items.

573926264.name: semi-automatic-body
573926264.description: Semi Automatic Bodies are components used in the crafting of Semi-Auto Pistols and Semi-Auto Rifles. They can be found quite commonly and can be recycled for a good profit.

576509618.name: portable-boom-box
576509618.description:
The Portable Boom Box can stream real world radio stations, and you can only use it on your hands. Voice Props DLC is required to craft it.

Stationary Boom Boxes can be found in the Underwater labs. These can be useful to drown out and "hide" your stepping sounds. Other players may have muted streams and cannot hear Boomboxes, making them useless to cover your steps.

Custom Streams have to be provided by the Server.

588596902.name: handmade-shell
588596902.description:
The handmade shell is an early-game shotgun ammunition that fires a spread of 20 low-damage pellets. It's highly damaging in close quarters, but its lethality quickly drops off as range increases.

In comparison to 12 gauge buckshot, the handmade shell has significantly more pellets, but less damage overall.

593465182.name: table
593465182.description: Every home needs a table. A decorative item which provides comfort when in close proximity.

596469572.name: rf-transmitter
596469572.description: A hand held RF signal broadcaster. If transmit signal matches with RF Receiver, the Output of RF Receiver starts flowing power if broadcasted.

602628465.name: parachute
602628465.description: Once equipped, press [+jump] while in mid-air to pull the cord. Must be repacked after use. Must be at least 15m above the ground in order to deploy.

602741290.name: burlap-shirt
602741290.description: While its resistances are far from fantastic, this cheap mess of cloth may give a player the edge they need as they struggle to establish themselves.

603811464.name: advanced-max-health-tea
603811464.description: A tea that increases your maximum health.

605467368.name: incendiary-5.56-rifle-ammo
605467368.description: A variant of the standard 5.56 rifle ammunition. The 5.56 Incendiary round will ignite on impact dealing both bullet and fire damage to a player. The round is however subject to increased bullet drop.

607400343.name: legacy-wood-shelter
607400343.description: The classic s*** shack. A great starter base for any fresh spawn. There is a limit to how many you can place.

609049394.name: battery-small
609049394.description: Small batteries are only obtainable through the console with sufficient permissions. It currently has no use.

610102428.name: industrial-conveyor
610102428.description: Moves an item from one container to another.

613961768.name: bota-bag
613961768.description:
The Bota Bag is a handmade pouch for the collection and transportation of drinkable water.

To fill, equip it and right click while looking at a source of water. You can then drink from it whenever you desire with a left click (make sure the water in the pouch is freshwater and not salt/stagnant water).

If the water in the pouch is not desired, or if you are attempting to extinguish a fire (not napalm), you can right click on the pouch again to dump it's contents.

615112838.name: rail-road-planter
615112838.description: A large planter with enough room to plant 9 seeds.

621915341.name: raw-pork
621915341.description: Raw pork. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

634478325.name: cctv-camera
634478325.description:
A CCTV Camera can be placed down to capture video footage and sound when powered and paired with a Computer Station.

A CCTV Camera has its own unique ID used to pair with a Computer Station. Once the CCTV Camera is powered with 5 rWm, the ID will then be available for anyone to pair with their own Computer Station. Always keep the IDs randomized as people can find out your camera IDs to monitor your base.

642482233.name: sticks
642482233.description: Sticks is an item that currently serves no purpose in the game.

649912614.name: revolver
649912614.description:
The Revolver is cheap, prime for early game use. Although inaccurate, the Revolver's quick rate of fire allows it hold its own against players at most stages. Being a revolver, it has a low capacity of just 8 shots, but it's still an upgrade from its 1- and 2- shot alternatives.

Taking a Revolver to a fight against opponents with metal armor is quite risky, as such opponents will take many more shots than normal to take out (even more so considering the small capacity). It is best advised to only use the Revolver against opponents with similar armaments or as a sidearm to another weapon.

656371026.name: high-quality-carburetor
656371026.description: A high quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.

656371027.name: medium-quality-carburetor
656371027.description: A medium quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.

656371028.name: low-quality-carburetor
656371028.description: A low quality carburetor for a combustion engine. Mixes air and fuel to the proper ratio.

657352755.name: beach-table
657352755.description: A small table to hold your drinks while relaxing.

665332906.name: timer
665332906.description: A Timer switch, will pass power through for duration.

671063303.name: riot-helmet
671063303.description: A mid-tier helmet that protects the user's head. Made without the need for High-Quality-Metal, the helmet is an inexpensive form of protection that offers exceptional melee resistance and amicable projectile resistance. It comes in a rather form-fitting default black skin, which tends to camouflage rather well, with several other user skins in the same vein.

671706427.name: reinforced-glass-window
671706427.description: The Reinforced Glass Window is now the highest-tier glass window. It replaced the Strengthened glass Window's spot for the highest HP window, and you are now unable to shoot through it. This makes it vital for loot rooms and external TCs. Not very useful for information gathering, as the viewing area is quite small and obstructed by thick bars.

674734128.name: festive-doorway-garland
674734128.description: A Festive decoration to spruce up your doorway during the holidays!

678698219.name: m4-shotgun
678698219.description: A semi automatic military issue shotgun

680234026.name: yellow-perch
680234026.description: A Yellow Perch, commonly found in freshwater rivers.

696029452.name: paper-map
696029452.description:
The Paper Map is one of the first things you should consider crafting when joining a new world. Costing only 5 wood it displays the entire island you have to explore.

To open the map, you must place it in your hotbar and then hold the G key on your keyboard. On this map you will see your marker and direction you are facing, the island's topography, biomes, points of interest, and even vending machine locations/names which can help new players substantially.

This item is no longer available to craft.

699075597.name: wooden-cross
699075597.description: A wooden cross marking the remains of an unknown soul.

703057617.name: military-flame-thrower
703057617.description:
The Military Flame Thrower is a military grade weapon that can only found in Heavy Scientists as a loot, which means it cant be craft by players.
It has maximum capacity of 150 low-grade fuel, and a high fire rate. It takes more damage and range, area of effect than the handmade Flame Thrower, let it possible to become a weapon to against your enemies in the base.
The Military Flame Thrower cause specific damage that ignores the players armor and defense, make constant value of damage.

709206314.name: tiger-mask
709206314.description: A special tiger mask to celebrate Chinese New Year

722955039.name: water-gun
722955039.description: A large water gun with pumpable pressure. Hold reload to pump!

742745918.name: industrial-splitter
742745918.description: Splits an industrial connection into three separate connections.

756517185.name: medium-present
756517185.description: A medium present, might be good! Collect 5 to upgrade to a larger present.

782422285.name: sofa-pattern
782422285.description: A comfortable old sofa with a floral pattern. A decorative item which provides comfort and seats two.

785728077.name: pistol-bullet
785728077.description: Standard ammunition for pistols and submachine guns.

794356786.name: hide-boots
794356786.description: The Hide Boots fall smack in the middle-tier of footwear, offering superiority only in defense against animal attacks. They are still quite cheap, however, so it might be worth it to upgrade from the Burlap Shoes.

794443127.name: christmas-tree
794443127.description: The Christmas Tree is a festive item that can be placed on most horizontal surfaces. Many things can be placed onto it to make it look better, such as; decorative baubles, Decorative Gingerbread Men, Decorative Pinecones, Decorative Plastic Candy Canes, Decorative Tinsel, Star Tree Topper and Tree Lights.

795236088.name: torch
795236088.description:
The torch is one of two items that the player spawns into the world with, and though it finds occasional use in navigating through the dim of night and absolute darkness of the underground, it's abilities beyond that are questionable.

It is considered unwise to employ the torch in darkness unless absolutely necessary, as you mark yourself a target to any players within eyeshot.

795371088.name: pump-shotgun
795371088.description: The Pump Shotgun is a mid-tier, close ranged weapon. With a magazine size of 6 and relatively fast firing rate it is ideal for close quarters raiding and combat. Its effective range varies only slightly on the ammo that is being used, but can be increased by using Slugs instead of Buckshot or Hand Made Shells.

803222026.name: repair-bench
803222026.description:
Repair benches offer a cost-effective way to repair once-broken items back to a usable state. Each repair costs half of the original cost of a new version of the item, and does not use components. Every time an item is repaired, it loses some of it's maximum durability. This is represented with a red portion on the durability bar of the item.

The Repair Bench can currently change the skin of any item you have (granted it HAS varying skins) to any skin that you own in your steam inventory.

803954639.name: blue-berry-seed
803954639.description:
These blue berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

809199956.name: gravestone
809199956.description: A Gravestone marking the remains of an unknown soul.

813023040.name: cooked-wolf-meat
813023040.description: Cooked Wolf Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

818877484.name: semi-automatic-pistol
818877484.description:
The semi-automatic pistol (commonly referred to as the 'P250' or 'P2') is a fast firing, medium damage weapon that has a moderate bullet velocity and steep damage drop-off.

It is an extremely popular weapon due to it's effectiveness at short-medium distances and it's low cost. It can be easily used as a primary weapon or as a compliment to pretty much any other gun.

826309791.name: two-sided-town-sign-post
826309791.description:
The Two sided Town Sign post is a sign post that you can place anywhere in the terrain.
It is very similar to the normal sign holders, except this can be placed anywhere except the walls.

It's not something you have, same as the other sign holders, but a skin you can buy on the market.

830839496.name: red-berry-seed
830839496.description:
These red berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

832133926.name: wood-armor-pants
832133926.description: The wood armor pants are a cheap, effective source of leg protection, uncontested in their role until the road sign kilt makes itself available. Though its projectile resistance is meager, it prospers in the early game as a melee meat shield.

833533164.name: large-wood-box
833533164.description:
A Large Wood Box is your most popular and conventional way to store your belongings. Each box has enough storage for 48x separate items/stacks of items.

They can have both locks and code locks placed on them to keep unwanted players at bay for a brief period. If destroyed, they will destroy a portion of their contents as well.

Boxes can be placed on shelves to save space.

835042040.name: medium-frankenstein-legs
835042040.description:
A balanced set of legs.

Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

838308300.name: burst-module
838308300.description: Forces the weapon to fire in 3 round bursts.

838831151.name: blue-berry-clone
838831151.description: A clipping of a Blue Berry Plant.

844440409.name: bronze-egg
844440409.description: A Bronze Egg. Open for a surprise or collect 10 to upgrade to a silver egg.

850280505.name: bucket-helmet
850280505.description: A mid-tier helmet that protects the user's head. Made without the need for High-Quality-Metal, the helmet is an inexpensive form of protection that substitutes metal frags with cloth and suffers for it. It currently floats an awkward position between the wood helm and the wolf headdress. The default skin is very bright and noticeable, though other user skins replace the color palette.

853471967.name: laser-light
853471967.description: A small device that shoots out visible lasers in time to music.

854447607.name: white-berry
854447607.description: A white berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.

858486327.name: green-berry
858486327.description: A green berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.

866889860.name: wooden-barricade
866889860.description: The Wooden Barricade will damage any player that touches it and is often used as part of base defense.

882559853.name: spider-webs
882559853.description: Giant Cobwebs which can be hung against both a ceiling and a wall.

884424049.name: compound-bow
884424049.description:
The Compound Bow is the most powerful bow. It can one shot someone with full gear. Pulling the bow while keeping stationary will increase the velocity and damage of the arrow.

As of December 2021, the Compound Bow received a nerf. You can no longer find it in default blueprints. You also can't pull the string on the Compound Bow for too long, otherwise it loses durability overtime.

888415708.name: rf-receiver
888415708.description: RF Receiver is capable of receiving RF signals from RF Broadcaster or RF Transmitter, if both signal matches, Power Out will start receiving power.

915408809.name: 40mm-smoke-grenade
915408809.description: Ammunition for a 40mm Grenade Launcher. Produces a cloud of smoke when fired.

926800282.name: medium-quality-valves
926800282.description: Medium quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.

935606207.name: minigun
935606207.description: A military issue belt-fed machine gun with that must be spun up to fire. Fires rapidly once spun up at the expense of movement speed.

935692442.name: longsleeve-t-shirt
935692442.description: Common torso attire sharing the same stats as the t-shirt. Default skin is very noticeable.

936496778.name: floor-grill
936496778.description: A Floor Grill is a building component able to be placed in floor frames. Floor Grills are able to be seen, but not shot, through. They are useful for allowing players to see if others are in a room or in front of the entrance to their base. Floor Grills offer less health, and invariably protection, than sheet metal (or arguably stone) floors. It is recommended to upgrade the floor frame in which the Floor Grill is placed to at least stone so that it will not prove to be a liability for the base.

952603248.name: weapon-flashlight
952603248.description: The Flashlight is a weapon attachment, able to be attached to eligible weapons. To use it, the user presses their attachment function key (default F), and a bright cone of light will emit from underneath the barrel of their weapon. Light is useful for being able to see in the dark or blinding other players if close enough.

960673498.name: large-hunting-trophy
960673498.description: A large trophy stand to mount the head of killed animals or enemies.

962186730.name: tin-can-alarm
962186730.description: A primitive perimeter alarm made from hanging tin cans. Clatters loudly when disturbed, alerting you to any trespassers. Simple but effective.

963906841.name: rock
963906841.description:
The Rock is practically the mascot of Rust. As both a weapon and tool, every player starting with one must use it to initially collect resources and protect themselves from the environment before upgrading to superior utensils. The Rock, if broken, is very cheap to craft, costing only a few stones.

It is unarguably the least efficient tool and weapon in the game. With its low gather rates and slow speed, most players will desire to immediately upgrade to at least stone tools once they have acquired enough resources.

968019378.name: clatter-helmet
968019378.description:
A special item for those who own Clatter.

To have it, it is necessary to buy from other games and play for 30 minutes.

968421290.name: connected-speaker
968421290.description: A small speaker that will play any audio from a connected Boom Box.

975983052.name: twitch-rivals-trophy
975983052.description: A trophy dedicated to the survivors of Rust Twitch Rivals

980333378.name: hide-poncho
980333378.description: With lower resistances than any other item that takes up a torso armor slot, the Hide Poncho's only real advantage is the warmth it provides. Good for those living in tundra and mountain areas, or perhaps for a new player that happens to have a lot of extra leather.

988652725.name: smart-switch
988652725.description: The Smart Switch is an upgrade to the normal Switch. It does not allow unauthorized players to use the Smart Switch and it can be paired to your phone.

996293980.name: human-skull
996293980.description: The skull of a human, harvest-able from other dead players. Displays the name of the victim you harvested the skull from.

998894949.name: corn-seed
998894949.description:
Corn seeds can be found when picking wild Corn plants. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.

Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster growth.

999690781.name: geiger-counter
999690781.description:
The Geiger Counter is a prop used by the Scientist NPC for scanning radiation.

This item cannot be obtained by player and can only be spawned by the admin.
The first person model shows the player holding a medical syringe and it has no function whatsoever.

1052926200.name: mining-quarry
1052926200.description:
The Mining Quarry is a machine that requires diesel fuel to run in exchange for stones, sulfur or high quality metal.

The Mining Quarry is always prioritized to spawn in Procedural Maps, Stone Quarry spawns in Temperate, Sulfur Quarry spawns in Desert and High Quality Metal Quarry spawns in Snow (although the seed might glitch and have them in the wrong biomes).

The Mining Quarry cannot be locked to a player. However, you can build High External Walls around the Mining Quarry and use auto turrets to stop players from entering the Mining Quarry and stealing your resources.

As of December 2017, mining quarry is no longer craftable or available as a loot drop. It is only obtainable by admins.

To place the Mining Quarry, you require Survey Charges. Find a biome that is common in the resources you want to mine. Throw them on a suitable spot (preferably flat ground). If any of the resources (stones, sulfur, high quality metal or crude oil) pops out from the explosion, it means the spot will have the resource for the Mining Quarry to mine (sometimes can be stones with sulfur or high quality metal). Turn 360 degrees to check if the Mining Quarry can be placed. If placed, put diesel fuel inside the blue barrels located at the side of the Mining Quarry and climb to the top and start the engine.

1055319033.name: 40mm-shotgun-round
1055319033.description: The 40mm shotgun round is an ammunition type for the Multiple Grenade Launcher. It fires a wide spread of 12 pellets that can do a massive amount of damage at close range, being able to one-shot a fully geared player if all pellets connect.

1058261682.name: christmas-lights
1058261682.description: A string of colored lights to decorate your home.

1072924620.name: high-quality-spark-plugs
1072924620.description: High quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.

1079279582.name: medical-syringe
1079279582.description:
The Medical Syringe is the best medical supply used for combat situations. It instant heals you a portion of your health and slowly heals the rest. It also reduces your radiation poisoning which is very useful while navigating the red puzzle building with high levels of radiation.

As of July 2021, the Medical Syringe can be used to revive people in Wounded state. It revives faster than holding E on the wounded player, however this gives you a disadvantage to look around and spot enemies as you will cancel the heal animation.

1081315464.name: nest-hat
1081315464.description: An extremely silly easter nest hat with googly eyes.

1090916276.name: pitchfork
1090916276.description: A 3 pronged pitchfork. Extremely easy to hit targets with.

1094293920.name: wrapping-paper
1094293920.description: Use this to conceal any item in a lazily wrapped gift

1099314009.name: barbeque
1099314009.description: The Barbeque acts as a larger, permanent campfire. It's capable of cooking a large amount of food at the same time. The lid opens when the Barbeque is ignited, but otherwise remains closed.

1103488722.name: snowball-gun
1103488722.description: Load snowballs and lay waste to your foes with Christmas cheer.

1104520648.name: chainsaw
1104520648.description:
The Chainsaw is a somewhat rare harvesting tool which is an upgrade to the Hatchet and Salvaged Axe. It requires fuel to use, holding up to 50 at once, and must be revved up before it can be used. The chainsaw quickly cuts through trees, even if it doesn't hit the weak spot, and is very useful for gathering large amounts of wood quickly.

The chainsaw can also be used as a melee weapon or for cutting through constructions, but beware that it loses durability very fast when doing these tasks.

1107575710.name: arctic-scientist-suit
1107575710.description: An Arctic Scientist Suit worn by the scientists which are found in arctic research bases. Unobtainable during normal gameplay, it can only be acquired through console by admins.

1110385766.name: metal-chest-plate
1110385766.description: The metal chest plate is a versatile end-game armor used most often when roaming and raiding. Though high quality metal is often stored in abundance due to its limited use, players should begin making room for the sewing kits as this period comes into the horizon.

1112162468.name: blue-berry
1112162468.description: A blue berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.

1121925526.name: candy-cane
1121925526.description: The Candy Cane is a festive item, it can be obtained only from food crates during a Christmas event. While uncommon, when found the Candy Cane is a great food source as two will fully fill the hunger bar.

1132603396.name: weapon-rack-stand
1132603396.description: Holds weaponry haphazardly, a charmingly chaotic addition to your virtual armory.

1142993169.name: ceiling-light
1142993169.description: A small ceiling mounted light source. It speeds up plants in a planter growth by 2x.

1149964039.name: storage-monitor
1149964039.description: The Storage Monitor attaches to the Tool Cupboard, Large Storage Box, and Vending Machine to monitor the container contents. Output sends a pulse when the container is updated.

1153652756.name: large-wooden-sign
1153652756.description: This is the middle ground of sign sizes. You can paint on the sign using the in-game editor. Signs are useful for indicating shop prices and more.

1158340331.name: medium-quality-crankshaft
1158340331.description: A medium quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.

1158340332.name: high-quality-crankshaft
1158340332.description: A high quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.

1158340334.name: low-quality-crankshaft
1158340334.description: A low quality crankshaft for a combustion engine. Converts piston movement into rotational motion.

1159991980.name: code-lock
1159991980.description:
The code lock is used to lock doors, hatches, and storage crates. Players may set a new four-digit PIN if the lock is unlocked. Once locked, an LED on the keypad will change to red, indicating its status.

Other players may attempt to gain access to a locked item by typing in a PIN in the keypad. If they are correct, a short beep will emit from the lock, and the player will subsequently have permanent access to the locked item (assuming the code isn't changed). If the player guesses incorrectly, a failure beep will play alongside an electric arc animation on the keypad, and the player will take increasing increments of damage until they wait long enough or die.

Guest codes may be set on unlocked locks (make sure it's locked after setting the code!), which allows other players access to the locked item without the ability to unlock, remove, or change the code.

Unlocked Code Locks may be removed or have a new password set by any player.

1160881421.name: hitch-&-trough
1160881421.description: A Hitching post and Trough. Dismounting your horses here will keep them healthy and fed as long as it is kept stocked with food.

1168856825.name: metal-detector
1168856825.description: Detects metal objects which may otherwise be hidden. When the light flashes, or you hear a beep, aim to search for items. Increase the bar until a flag appears. Dig at the flag with a melee item to reveal what it is. Different areas yield different rewards. The metal detector does not work on safezones.

1171735914.name: and-switch
1171735914.description: A logic gate that allows eletrical passthrough if BOTH inputs receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source.

1177596584.name: elevator
1177596584.description: A powered elevator. Place another elevator above or below this to connect it. Requires power.

1181207482.name: heavy-plate-helmet
1181207482.description:
A high-tier protective helmet which protects the entire head. It costs High Quality Metal and Sheet Metal making it fairly easy to acquire near monuments and dungeons.

The Heavy Plate Helmet will cause a user's view to be diminished to a small rectangle.

Due to heavy plate armour suffering from increased fire damage, it can be countered by a flamethrower or incendiary ammo.

1186655046.name: fuel-tank-vehicle-module
1186655046.description: Dual module large fuel tank. Useful for transporting water over large distances.

1189981699.name: crate-costume
1189981699.description: A sneaky crate costume. Use with a friend to expertly troll other players

1199391518.name: road-signs
1199391518.description: Road signs are a component used in the crafting of the mid-tier armors Road Sign Jacket, and Road Sign Kilt, along with crafting the salvaged cleaver. Also good as a source of scrap throughout the game.

1205084994.name: large-photo-frame
1205084994.description: A large frame for your photos.

1205607945.name: two-sided-hanging-sign
1205607945.description: A double sided hanging sign, to attach to buildings.

1221063409.name: armored-double-door
1221063409.description: The armored double door is the highest tier double door and is the best for base defense. Because of its high durability, if the door is placed in a weak wall frame, raiders may target the wall frame instead of the door itself. The door has working hatches and these hatches allow you to see outside of the door and can be shot through in both directions.

1230323789.name: smg-body
1230323789.description: A rare component which is used for crafting submachine guns. It can only be found in military and elite crates.

1230691307.name: captain's-log
1230691307.description: A deteriorating piece of paper with information relating to the last moments of this vessel.

1234878710.name: telephone
1234878710.description: Use the telephone to call other telephones on the island!

1234880403.name: sewing-kit
1234880403.description: Sewing Kits are highly valued by mid to high tier players for their use in both roadsign and metal Armour.

1242482355.name: jack-o-lantern-angry
1242482355.description: A Lantern. Place it where you need light.

1242522330.name: cursed-cauldron
1242522330.description: A spooky cast iron cauldron with a green goo.

1248356124.name: timed-explosive-charge
1248356124.description:
The Timed Explosive Charge, mostly knowns as C4, is an item often used when raiding other players. Once thrown, the charge will stick to walls, floors, doors and deployable items.

Once attached to a target, the timed explosives will automatically detonate in a dependable and quick manner (in comparison to it's unreliable counterpart, the Satchel Charge). However, it does damage only to the structure it's attached to. If attached to a door, for example, it would destroy it without damaging the door frame or nearby walls.

This item deals the most damage out of all explosive devices, and is the most ideal/useful for evicting your neighbors. It's important to protect this item from your enemies, as it can prove fatal once it's in the wrong hands.

1263920163.name: smoke-grenade
1263920163.description:
The Smoke Grenade is a non-lethal canister-type grenade with many useful purposes. It creates a large cloud of thick grayish smoke that cannot be seen through. It can be used in various environments to cover you from enemy vision, forcing them to either shoot or reposition.
Best used in urban or wooded areas, where the flat surface will let it create the smoke screen.

It can be acquired from Outpost vending machines and crafted.

1266491000.name: hazmat-suit
1266491000.description:
The Hazmat Suit allows the wearer to travel through rad-towns and other irradiated areas safely. While it doesn't provide full protection in certain places at monuments, such as the main building at Launch Site, or the cooling tower at the Nuclear Power Plant, it offers protection from radiation poisoning at almost every other monument on the map, making it useful for exploring.

The suit itself is a bright yellow color, meaning it is easy to spot from a distance.

1268178466.name: green-industrial-wall-light
1268178466.description: The Green Industrial Wall Light has the same function as the White Industrial Wall but emits a green light.

1272194103.name: red-berry
1272194103.description: a red berry, used in the making of various types of tea.

1272430949.name: wheelbarrow-piano
1272430949.description: The Piano is a repurposed wheelbarrow that weighs a ton, but makes up for it with a wide range of notes.

1272768630.name: spoiled-human-meat
1272768630.description: Spoiled Human Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

1293102274.name: xor-switch
1293102274.description: An exclusive-or logic gate that allows eletrical passthrough if ONLY ONE input receives power, passthrough amount is whichever single input is active. if BOTH inputs recieve power, passthrough will be zero.

1296788329.name: homing-missile
1296788329.description: Fast moving rocket ammunition. Uses a type of radar for active target guidance from a Homing Launcher

1307626005.name: storage-barrel-vertical
1307626005.description: Keep your things in this wooden barrel. Stores up to 48 items. Cannot be locked.

1315082560.name: ox-mask
1315082560.description: An Ox mask to celebrate the 2021 Lunar New Year.

1318558775.name: mp5a4
1318558775.description:
The MP5A4 is a craftable, military-grade 30-round submachine gun. Dealing moderate to low damage with low recoil which makes it extremely effective at close range. However, the MP5A4 has one of the widest spreads in the game, limiting its use to short range. Although, like the LR300, this can be countered with a lasersight, making it viable for medium-range combat.

The MP5 is currently the only craftable military-grade weapon.

1319617282.name: small-loot-bag
1319617282.description: Open for a surprise, or collect 10 to upgrade to a medium loot bag containing better loot!

1324203999.name: champagne-boomer
1324203999.description: A very large mortar type firework with an massive champagne colored explosion followed by smaller orange starbursts

1326180354.name: salvaged-sword
1326180354.description: Usually considered as the 'best' melee weapon because of its ability to take out most targets with one blow to the head, the Salvaged Sword is a cheap and durable weapon that most keep as a backup plan in the event of a fight turning to close quarters.

1327005675.name: short-ice-wall
1327005675.description: A short wall made of solid ice.

1330084809.name: low-quality-valves
1330084809.description: Low quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.

1346158228.name: pumpkin-bucket
1346158228.description: A pumpkin basket to help you collect candy much faster during Trick or Treat events with left click. Use right click to throw candy

1353298668.name: armored-door
1353298668.description: The Armored Door is the highest tier door and is the best option for base defense. If the door is put on a weaker door frame, the door frame will be targeted instead of the door itself. The door has a working hatch which allows you to see outside of the door and can be shot through in both directions.

1358643074.name: snow-machine
1358643074.description: A machine which will blanket the surrounding terrain in snow.

1361520181.name: minecart-planter
1361520181.description: A small planter with enough room to plant 2 seeds.

1366282552.name: leather-gloves
1366282552.description:
The minuscule damage reduction of the leather gloves is off-set by the tendency for the player to be shot in the chest rather than the legs, as well as the reduced cost in comparison to the boots.

As was described, the protection of the gloves extend to the rest of the chest as well.

1367190888.name: corn
1367190888.description: An ear of corn. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst. Can be found at rivers and sold at Bandit Camp for 10 scrap per 15 corns.

1371909803.name: tesla-coil
1371909803.description: An electrical trap that zaps nearby players when powered. More power supplied will result in higher damage. Loses durability with use.

1373240771.name: wooden-barricade-cover
1373240771.description: Perfect for cover when engaging in gun fights. Decays rapidly when placed outside of building privilege.

1373971859.name: python-revolver
1373971859.description: The Python deals a great amount of damage per shot, but it has only 6 bullets in one magazine. It is pretty useful for shorter - medium distances. If combined with something like a Thompson, or even a Nailgun, the Python is pretty useful.

1376065505.name: rear-seats-vehicle-module
1376065505.description: Single module seating for two passengers.

1381010055.name: leather
1381010055.description: One of the resources commonly acquired through harvesting most animals. It's necessary for the making of mid and end tier armors, needed by every Rust player. Acquired in abundance mainly through the harvesting of bears and wolves.

1382263453.name: barbed-wooden-barricade
1382263453.description:
The barbed wooden barricade is the second tier of barricades that will damage other players. It can be placed on foundations, and floors.

They deal more damage than the wooden barricades but less then the metal barricade. Also you can get the bleeding effect when you touch them. Trying deal damage with melee attacks will damage you as if you ran into them.

1390353317.name: sheet-metal-double-door
1390353317.description: It has the same health as a sheet metal door. It requires double the materials, but allows for more space within your base. Ideal for loot rooms and other cramped areas.

1391703481.name: burnt-pork
1391703481.description: This little piggy has been in the oven for too long.

1397052267.name: supply-signal
1397052267.description:
A purple smoke grenade that calls in an airdrop somewhere in a small radius around it. Can be found as a rare drop in Military and Elite Crates.

When you use this item, it will release a plume of purple smoke that can let players who are far away know that there may be individuals who just called in an airdrop. A Cargo Plane will spawn somewhere in the sky and will release the payload to your location shortly.

Calling for an airdrop to your base, especially one with high walls or a nearby monument (water pump stations, oilrig) is a fair choice. It may deter other players from looting the payload or, if you're feeling 'spicy', may bring the pvp to your front door.

1400460850.name: saddle-bag
1400460850.description: Equipping this saddle bag will add extra storage space on your horse

1401987718.name: duct-tape
1401987718.description: Duct Tape: Currently not used with any or has any use/purpose within the game at the current moment. Maybe FacePunch will give it a use at a later time.

1409529282.name: door-closer
1409529282.description: Automatically closes doors for you after a short duration, so that you don't have to manually close the door every time. It can be spawned by admins with sufficient privileges via console. Normal players will not be able to get it via barrels nor crates.

1413014235.name: fridge
1413014235.description: Item used for storing various types of food and drink. Currently serves no use however it is speculated food will eventually spoil if left out in chests, furnaces, or boxes in the updates to come.

1414245162.name: note
1414245162.description:
A note which can have letters written on but not notes. When a note is done being written on the player may place it in a container or leave it in their inventory. Useful for conveying messages to other players or raiders.

Notes are the only items that may be placed inside of mailboxes, and are handy for keeping in contact with friendly neighbors.

1414245522.name: rope
1414245522.description:
Rope is quite common component used in many items like wooden armor, satchel charges, ladders and shotgun traps. Because of that it remains relatively useful throughout the whole game.

It can be often found in barrels alongside sewing kits which can be recycled for even more rope.

1422530437.name: raw-deer-meat
1422530437.description: Raw Deer Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

1424075905.name: water-bucket
1424075905.description: The water bucket is a useful motive for transporting liquid, however if it is stowed in the inventory, all of the contents will be emptied.

1430085198.name: industrial-crafter
1430085198.description: Attaches to a workbench to allow automated crafting.

1443579727.name: hunting-bow
1443579727.description:
An old school weapon for new school fun. Useful for short to medium range combat. Arrows shot have a chance to break when they hit, so be sure to carry more than one arrow.

Can use either regular Arrows or High-Velocity Arrows which are able to go farther faster, but do less damage. Best used to hunt animals and other humans.

1451568081.name: chainlink-fence-gate
1451568081.description: The chainlink fence gate is used as a door and is usually used in conjunction with the chainlink fence. It can be used as an extra layer of base security if needed. It is placed in a building frame. Player and turrets are able to shoot through the fence gate and kill players on the other side.

1478091698.name: muzzle-brake
1478091698.description: The Muzzle Brake is a barrel attachment used to reduce recoil with the cost of weapon damage. It is very effective for recoils that is hard to control, like the Assault Rifle. However, the Muzzle Brake will drastically decrease the velocity of the bullets, giving you a disadvantage for long range battles. It is recommended with full-auto weapons or semi-auto weapons.

1480022580.name: basic-ore-tea
1480022580.description: A tea that increases the amount of ore you receive.

1488979457.name: jackhammer
1488979457.description: Along with The Team System Update, the Jackhammer was the competitor, tool wise, to the chainsaw. It can be found in tool crates or sunken crates. It does not need fuel, and can be repaired at a repair bench or replenished at a workbench for no cost.

1491189398.name: paddle
1491189398.description: A versatile melee weapon that can also be used to paddle a kayak.

1491753484.name: medium-frankenstein-torso
1491753484.description:
A balanced torso.

Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

1512054436.name: potato-clone
1512054436.description: A Clipping of a Potato Plant.

1516985844.name: netting
1516985844.description: A placeable object which provides a climbable surface.

1521286012.name: double-sign-post
1521286012.description: A double sign post that you can plant into terrain.

1523195708.name: targeting-computer
1523195708.description: Used for crafting auto turrets, or recycling a large amounts of scrap.

1523403414.name: cassette-short
1523403414.description: A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 10s of audio.

1524187186.name: workbench-level-1
1524187186.description: The tier 1 Work Bench acts as a gateway towards crafting early game gear, including salvaged weapons and armor. You can find them at the Scientist Outpost and the Bandit Camp monuments.

1524980732.name: carvable-pumpkin
1524980732.description:
A pumpkin that you can carve.

Requires wood as a fuel source.

1525520776.name: building-plan
1525520776.description:
The Building Plan is used to create weak twig structures at the cost of a nominal amount of wood. These twigs may be upgraded with a Hammer if the player has the resources to do so.

Players may not build in zones in which there is a tool cupboard that they are not authorized on. Additionally, players may not build in certain areas of the map (such as near a radtown). Otherwise, players may build anywhere of their choosing.

1533551194.name: white-berry-clone
1533551194.description: A clipping of a White Berry Plant.

1534542921.name: chair
1534542921.description: The chair is normally made for decorative purpose. But you can mount it to receive 100% comfort. Hover over it and press the E key to mount it and press the space bar to dismount it.

1536610005.name: cooked-human-meat
1536610005.description: Cooked Human Meat is gathered by cooking Raw Human Meat. Eating it results in gain of calories but as a disadvantage loss of hydration. It is recommended to only eat it if you have a good water source.

1538126328.name: industrial-combiner
1538126328.description: Combines three separate industrial connections into one connection.

1540934679.name: wooden-spear
1540934679.description:
The Wooden Spear will inflict damage and cause the 'Bleeding' effect on the target.

The Wooden Spear is throwable. After being thrown it will become stuck in the place it had hit (in the target). You can pick it up by pressing the 'Use' button (default 'E').

Can be upgraded to Stone Spear.

1542290441.name: single-sign-post
1542290441.description: A single sign post that you can plant into terrain.

1545779598.name: assault-rifle
1545779598.description:
The Assault Rifle is an accurate, powerful, and fully automatic rifle that fires 5.56 rifle rounds. It has a moderate rate of fire which allows for proficiency at close to medium range.

Strong recoil makes it more difficult to fire in full-auto at long range, but experienced users may be able to control it more effectively.

The Assault Rifle is generally used as an end-game multipurpose weapon, able to take fights at any range.

1548091822.name: apple
1548091822.description: The apple is a food that gives the player food and water. Unlike most other foods the apple gives lots more hydration when consumed. Can be found in food crates and medical crates.

1553078977.name: bleach
1553078977.description: Bleach is only obtainable through the console with sufficient permissions. It currently has no use.

1559915778.name: single-horse-saddle
1559915778.description: A horse saddle with one seat. Having this item allows you to claim a horse in a stable by holding E and selecting the 'Claim' option

1568388703.name: diesel-fuel
1568388703.description: Appropriate fuel for the Giant Excavator Pit monument, can be found in the Dome, Junkyard, Small/Large Oil Rig or purchased with 300 Low Grade Fuel in Outpost.

1569882109.name: handmade-fishing-rod
1569882109.description:
Handmade Fishing Rod is a tool used to catch fishes as well as junks that might come in handy.

To use the Handmade Fishing Rod, hold RMB and cast out with LMB. Once you've got a bait ready to go simply aim at the water while holding RMB and cast out with LMB. Once you've got a bite, you'll need to reel in the fish. You can use A/D to pull left and right and S to reel the fish in.

1575635062.name: frankenstein-table
1575635062.description: The Frankenstein Table is a halloween exclusive item released in 2021's Halloween Event. By placing in a Frankenstein Head, Frankenstein Torso and Frankenstein Legs, you will create your own pet. Flipping the switch of the Frankenstein Table awakens the pet, you can then order it to assist, attack, follow, stand and more actions.

1581210395.name: large-planter-box
1581210395.description:
Large planters are a planter variant that fits nicely in a 1x1 floor/foundation. It can hold a maximum of 9 separate plants, including corn, hemp, and pumpkin.

Seeds placed in a planter grow 2x as fast as they would normally on wild ground. Being exposed to light (be it natural sunlight or artificial ceiling lamps) further increases the growth time to 4x the normal speed. Planters also grant you the ability to water the plants, which significantly increases their yield when harvested. A fully matured hemp plant produces 10 cloth normally, but can produce up to 40 cloth when watered properly.

To fill your planter with water, simply fill a bucket and dump it straight onto your planter. The maximum amount of water a large planter can hold at once is exactly 9000 ml, and once plants are planted they will soak up an initial amount of water, so it will drain the water fast initially. You may need to refill the planter several times if using many plants at the same time.

1588298435.name: bolt-action-rifle
1588298435.description: The Bolt Action Rifle is a powerful late game rifle that offers high accuracy and high damage at the cost of speed. Having the most damage and least spread of any weapon, it is often used as a designated sniper rifle, and is commonly fitted with a scope to increase the sight range for the user. Its slow rate of fire greatly limits its use in close quarters combat, and its limited capacity forces users to take shots very carefully. Having a very fast bullet velocity, users need not lead targets or compensate for gravity as much as with other weapons firing a slower bullet.

1588492232.name: drone
1588492232.description: A remote controlled drone operated from the Computer station with a limited range. Easily damaged from impacts.

1602646136.name: stone-spear
1602646136.description:
The Stone Spear is slightly more durable and does more damage than the Wooden Spear.

The Stone Spear will cause critical bleeding (high percentage bleeding).

The Stone Spear, like the Wooden Spear, is throwable. After being thrown it will become stuck in the place it had hit (even in the target). You can pick it up by pressing the Use button (default 'E').

1603174987.name: confetti-cannon
1603174987.description: Blast a cloud of birthday themed confetti cheer.

1608640313.name: tank-top
1608640313.description: The tank top offers inferior resistances at equivalent production cost when compared to the hide vest. Its only redeeming quality is that it can be found in crates, but its drop chance is pathetic even in that regard. If that wasn't enough, the burlap shirt also triumphs over this advanced piece of role player technology. If you do manage to come across one and are possessed into wanting to manufacture more, be prepared to cough up 75 scrap.

1614528785.name: heavy-frankenstein-torso
1614528785.description:
Slightly slower, slightly stronger.

Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

1623701499.name: industrial-wall-light
1623701499.description:
The Industrial Wall Light is a mountable light that can be placed on walls, ceilings or floors. It functions just like the Ceiling Light with smaller light radius. There are 3 variations of the Industrial Wall Light, White, Green and Red.

It was released with the mandatory update "Nomad" that came along with the permanent shop.

1629293099.name: snowman
1629293099.description: Get into the holiday spirit with this decorative snowman.

1638322904.name: incendiary-rocket
1638322904.description: Incendiary rockets spread flames over the area of impact, dealing fire damage to its surroundings. It deals heavy damage to wooden structures and turrets. They can also be used effectively to trap and kill players in an enclosed space.

1655650836.name: metal-barricade
1655650836.description: The Metal Barricade will damage any player that touches it and is often used as part of base defense. Its high amount of health relative to other barricades makes it an especially good tool for denying areas, as often explosives must be used to remove it.

1655979682.name: empty-can-of-beans
1655979682.description: An empty can of beans are what's left after eating a can of beans. They can be smelted in a campfire to give metal fragments.

1658229558.name: lantern
1658229558.description:
A Lantern. Place it where you need light, requires low grade fuel to work.

Can be placed on the ground deployables. Consumes 1 low grade fuel per 10 minutes.

1659447559.name: wooden-horse-armor
1659447559.description: A set of wooden horse armor

1660145984.name: yellow-berry
1660145984.description: A yellow berry. Can be eaten or used in mixing table recipes to create teas.

1668129151.name: cooked-fish
1668129151.description: Cooked Fish. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

1668858301.name: small-stocking
1668858301.description: A small stocking. Hang it by a fire and you might just get a gift! Collect 6 to upgrade to a SUPER Stocking.

1675639563.name: beenie-hat
1675639563.description: Equivalent stats to baseball cap while being more expensive and requiring research to create.

1686524871.name: decorative-gingerbread-men
1686524871.description: Decorative Gingerbread Men you can hang on your Christmas tree.

1696050067.name: modular-car-lift
1696050067.description:
Allows you to modify modular vehicles. Modules can be fully repaired more cost-effective than manual repair by hammer. Cannot move or remove modules with items inside (liquid in fluid tank, items in storage module, parts in engine), but allows you to quick-remove all items. Can add/remove a locks to/from cockpit module and craft keys (lock is removed when module is removed from chassis).

Removing modules can let you research them to be crafted and placed on other chassis later, and removing all modules from a chassis presents you the option to destroy the chassis.

As of "Mixing Table Update," cars no longer decay on powered lifts.

1697996440.name: landscape-photo-frame
1697996440.description: A landscape oriented canvas for artists paintings.

1711033574.name: bone-club
1711033574.description: The Bone Club is a cheap, simple to craft melee weapon of the early game. Despite its shortcomings, the Bone Club serves as an upgrade to the Rock, being better at both harvesting resources and fighting.

1712070256.name: hv-5.56-rifle-ammo
1712070256.description: A variant of the standard 5.56 rifle ammunition. The High Velocity (HV) 5.56 round will travel faster than the standard round at a more expensive crafting cost. The round experiences little bullet drop. This type of ammo is best used with Bolt Action Rifle and L96 Rifle.

1712261904.name: pure-max-health-tea
1712261904.description: A tea that increases your maximum health.

1714496074.name: candle-hat
1714496074.description: The candle hat may not have the best protection by itself, but it can be used in conjunction with the bandana to great effect. That said, it should be turned off when fighting in the dark so as to not give your opponent a visibility advantage. It commonly finds brief usage when a player desires to expand their base or mine under the cover of night.

1719978075.name: bone-fragments
1719978075.description: Bone fragments are obtainable from any corpse and used in armor and tools.

1722154847.name: hide-pants
1722154847.description: Superior bite resistance and inferior cold resistance is all that divides the hide pants from the burlap trousers. The limited availability of leather prompts most players to save it for boots, gloves, or higher-end armor.

1723747470.name: tree-lights
1723747470.description: A tree isn't complete without colorful lights!

1729120840.name: wooden-door
1729120840.description:
The Wooden Door is an early game building item that is made from wood and cheap to produce. Being the cheapest of all the doors, it is often used alongside a Lock to quickly secure a base. Its vulnerability to fire and weak explosive resistance makes the door a temporary solution to securing your base. Due to its flaws it should quickly be upgraded to a higher tier door such as Sheet Metal.

The Wooden Door can take two kinds of locks the basic Lock and the Code Lock. To pick up the door, remove any locks, hold down the E (USE) key and select 'Pickup'. Note: There is currently a bug where a door sometimes can not be picked up until any type of Lock has been placed and removed.

1729374708.name: pure-ore-tea
1729374708.description: A tea that increases the amount of ore you receive.

1729712564.name: portrait-photo-frame
1729712564.description: A portrait oriented canvas for artists paintings.

1744298439.name: blue-boomer
1744298439.description: A very large mortar type firework with a blue starburst

1746956556.name: bone-armor
1746956556.description:
Respectable projectile and melee resistance has promoted bone armor to a heightened status within the primitive era.

Its slot efficiency is often exploited during helicopter patrols.

1751045826.name: hoodie
1751045826.description: The hoodie offers the greatest projectile and melee resistance out of all the under armor variants. This superiority is offset by its high research and production cost.

1757265204.name: silver-egg
1757265204.description: A Silver Egg. Contains medium level loot, Collect 10 to upgrade to a gold Egg

1770475779.name: worm
1770475779.description: A small, writhing worm that can be used for bait. Could also be eaten in desperate situations.

1776460938.name: blood
1776460938.description: Blood is currently not used as a component in any item in Rust, and will not drop normally. It was formerly used to craft medical supplies. It may be re-implemented at a future time.

1783512007.name: cactus-flesh
1783512007.description: Cactus flesh can be harvested from Cacti with an axe or rock. They provide little food value, however they give much needed hydration in the desert.

1784406797.name: sousaphone
1784406797.description: A collection of used piping thats been converted into a Tuba. Probably not very hygienic.

1789825282.name: candy-cane-club
1789825282.description: The Candy Cane Club is much better used as a Food or Medical item rather than a Melee weapon as it's damage is comparable to the Bone club.

1796682209.name: custom-smg
1796682209.description: The Custom SMG is a quick-firing, low damage submachine gun with moderate recoil. Its moderate spread and low bullet velocity limit the use of the weapon to close and possibly moderate ranges, but its maximum range can be extended through the use of attachments like the Silencer or Weapon Lasersight to increase accuracy. The Custom SMG is the least expensive submachine gun, and fires the quickest out of every weapon in the game. With no movement penalty, like other SMGs, this weapon is most effectively used while on the move.

1803831286.name: garry's-mod-tool-gun
1803831286.description:
Garry's Mod Tool Gun is a special tool that has the same functions as the Hammer, with slightly increased range and repairs faster.

It can be obtained by buying Garry's Mod on your current Steam account and play for at least 30 minutes.

1814288539.name: bone-knife
1814288539.description: An early game weapon made out of bone. Very good to have early on due to it harvesting the most out of hunted animals (or humans!)

1819863051.name: sky-lantern
1819863051.description: A beautiful sky lantern. Can be launched in any direction. Has one inventory slot. Can be Ignited with a lit torch.

1827479659.name: burnt-wolf-meat
1827479659.description: Burned Wolf Meat is the product of overcooking meat in a camp fire. Consuming it will damage your health, as with all other burnt meats.

1835946060.name: cable-tunnel
1835946060.description: Allows you to pass a cable through a wall. Each input will forward the amount it receives to the corresponding output on the other side.

1840570710.name: above-ground-pool
1840570710.description: A large wooden pool that can be filled with water.

1840822026.name: beancan-grenade
1840822026.description: The Beancan Grenade is an early-game tool. They're used to craft Satchel Charges, but can be used by themselves in raiding. The Beancan Grenade has a random detonation period and can kill a player if it's within the range. The Beancan Grenade has a 15% chance to be a dud. However, Beancan Grenades have a 50% chance to explode when you attempt to pick them up again after a dud.

1849887541.name: small-generator
1849887541.description: A small electric generator powered by Low Grade Fuel that outputs 40 power.

1850456855.name: road-sign-kilt
1850456855.description: The lack of a metal chest plate or jacket equivalent to leg armor allows the road sign kilt a monopoly on both mid and end-game leg armor. Heavy plate pants are all that can surpass it statistically, but those are seldom seen outside of airlock brawls due to their movement penalty.

1856217390.name: egg-basket
1856217390.description: An easter egg basket. Equip to pick up eggs during an easter egg hunt with left click. Use right click to throw Painted Eggs that deal splash damage.

1865253052.name: dracula-mask
1865253052.description: A classic halloween costume mask which provides decent protection.

1873897110.name: cooked-bear-meat
1873897110.description: Delicious Bear Meat, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

1874610722.name: armored-cockpit-vehicle-module
1874610722.description: Single module armored cockpit for a driver and one passenger.

1877339384.name: burlap-headwrap
1877339384.description: As a default blueprint, the burlap headwrap is occasionally crafted during early-game after the hunting bow and bandages.

1882709339.name: metal-blade
1882709339.description:
Metal blades are common components that can be found in barrels near roads or at monuments. They are used to craft some tools and melee weapons.

If you don't have any use for the items you can craft with these it would be wise to recycle them for two scrap.

1883981798.name: low-quality-pistons
1883981798.description: Low quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.

1883981800.name: high-quality-pistons
1883981800.description: High quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.

1883981801.name: medium-quality-pistons
1883981801.description: Medium quality pistons for a combustion engine. Pistons convert expanding combustion gases into the motion that turns a crankshaft.

1885488976.name: spooky-speaker
1885488976.description: Frighten your guests with creepy and spooky halloween sounds!

1895235349.name: disco-ball
1895235349.description: Get groovy with this stunning disco ball.

1898094925.name: pumpkin-plant-clone
1898094925.description:
A Clipping of a pumpkin plant.
Pumpkin Clones/Cuttings are collected by holding -E- on a 65% grown pumpkin plant

1899610628.name: medium-loot-bag
1899610628.description: Contains medium level loot, Collect 10 to upgrade to a Large loot bag, containing the best loot

1903654061.name: small-planter-box
1903654061.description:
Small planters are a planter variant that can be placed in less spacious areas. It can hold a maximum of 3 separate plants, including corn, hemp, and pumpkin.

Seeds placed in a planter grow 2x as fast as they would normally on wild ground. Being exposed to light (be it natural sunlight or artificial ceiling lamps) further increases the growth time to 4x the normal speed. Planters also grant you the ability to water the plants, which significantly increases their yield when harvested. A fully matured hemp plant produces 10 cloth normally, but can produce up to 40 cloth when watered properly.

To fill your planter with water, simply fill a bucket/water jug with clean water and dump it straight onto your planter. The maximum amount of water the small planter box can hold at once is 3000ml.

1905387657.name: pure-rad.-removal-tea
1905387657.description: A tea that removes some radiation.

1911552868.name: black-berry-seed
1911552868.description:
