These black berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

1914691295.name: prototype-17
1914691295.description: A burst fire prototype pistol. Burst fire is toggleable by pressing M.

1917703890.name: burnt-horse-meat
1917703890.description: Burned horse. Eating it will damage your health.

1931713481.name: black-raspberries
1931713481.description: Black Raspberries provide a large amount of health and hydration when compared to other foods, but they can only be found in monuments in food crates (not to be confused with ration boxes) making them hard to come by.

1946219319.name: camp-fire
1946219319.description: A basic survival tool - used to cook food, smelt tin cans, keep warm, provide comfort to players, and light up dark areas.

1948067030.name: ladder-hatch
1948067030.description: Building element for the vertical connection between two floors. Fits into a floor frame.

1950721418.name: salvaged-shelves
1950721418.description: Metal shelves often used for storage of wooden boxes, as well as a possible decoration of your home.

1953903201.name: nailgun
1953903201.description: A low powered low range early game weapon using nailgun nails as ammunition. The nailgun is easily accessible, very cheap and makes a good secondary weapon when in early game.

1965232394.name: crossbow
1965232394.description: The Crossbow is a low-tier weapon that can fire either a high-velocity or regular arrow a decent distance. It is capable of relatively high damage, and is a great option when paired with a Waterpipe Shotgun or Eoka Pistol or Nailgun.

1973165031.name: birthday-cake
1973165031.description: A very special and happy birthday to rust!

1973684065.name: burnt-chicken
1973684065.description: Burnt Chicken is obtained by overcooking Raw Chicken Breast. It is still edible without being harmed.

1973949960.name: frontier-bolts-single-item-rack
1973949960.description: Artfully display your weapon with a handcrafted wall-mounted single weapon rack.

1975934948.name: survey-charge
1975934948.description:
A survey charge is a small explosive that is used to determine the mineral content of an area of ground. The survey charge is placed on the ground where it explodes and throws an amount of resources into the air. The resources thrown are directly proportional to the yield of a mining quarry when placed over the crater left by the survey charge. The impact crater can also be examined manually which will generate a note containing the numerical analysis of the minerals present.
The survey charge also deals damage in an area of affect upon explosion. While ineffective against players due to the fuse and low damage, it can be used to help raid sheet metal doors if they are available, and provide enough damage to not be worth recycling instead.

1983621560.name: floor-triangle-grill
1983621560.description: A floor grill must be placed in floor frames. Perfect for placing above a large furnace.

1989785143.name: high-quality-horse-shoes
1989785143.description: Equipping these horse shoes will grant your horse additional movement speed

1992974553.name: burlap-trousers
1992974553.description: About as basic as it gets. Burlap Trousers offer meager protection across the board at a cheap price, yet remains better at cold resistance than some of its perceived 'superiors' such as the Hide Pants.

2009734114.name: christmas-door-wreath
2009734114.description: Get into the christmas spirit with this holiday door wreath.

2019042823.name: tarp
2019042823.description: Tarps are used for the crafting of planter boxes, and water catchers. They can also be recycled for 50x cloth each. These are very common and can prove to be a good source of cloth.

2021351233.name: advanced-rad.-removal-tea
2021351233.description: A tea that removes some radiation.

2023888403.name: medium-rechargeable-battery
2023888403.description: A Medium Rechargable Battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.

2024467711.name: pure-scrap-tea
2024467711.description: A tea that increases the amount of scrap you receive from barrels.

2040726127.name: combat-knife
2040726127.description:
The Combat Knife is an extremely useful melee weapon that required Tier 1 workbench to craft, basically an upgraded bone knife. Its exquisite design structure makes it the best skinning efficiency among similar melees, which means you can get the full loot from skinning with shortest time. Its cheap cost makes it the most cost-effective farming tool.
You can untie the creates underwater with combat knife, and attack while running.

2041899972.name: triangle-ladder-hatch
2041899972.description: A hatch that opens and changes into a ladder.

2048317869.name: wolf-skull
2048317869.description: The wolf skull allows players to craft the wolf headdress. Can be smashed for bone fragments.

2063916636.name: advanced-ore-tea
2063916636.description: A tea that increases the amount of ore you receive.

2068884361.name: small-backpack
2068884361.description: A small, makeshift backpack that lets you carry 12 extra items.

2070189026.name: large-banner-on-pole
2070189026.description: Offers basic drawing features. Same as all the other items you can draw on but only this one is standing so you can place it on foundations, rocks and other places to show off just how good Monet you are.

2087678962.name: search-light
2087678962.description: The search light is a deployable item which produces a bright beam of light. It has a 360 degree range of motion, and can be controlled by a player. It runs on electricity much like auto turrets.

2090395347.name: large-solar-panel
2090395347.description: A solar panel which converts sunlight into energy. The amount of energy generated is dependent on the sun's intensity and angle to the panel.

2100007442.name: audio-alarm
2100007442.description: A speaker which will emit a loud warning alarm when powered.

2104517339.name: strobe-light
2104517339.description: A flashing light, 3 speeds. Causes seizures.

2106561762.name: decorative-tinsel
2106561762.description: Decorative Tinsel you can hang on your Christmas tree.

2114754781.name: water-purifier
2114754781.description: The water purifier is a useful tool as an early game solution for obtaining clean drinking water. You can only place the water purifier on top of a campfire, while the campfire is active, the salt water is filtered out of the propane tank and flows into the bucket, for easy consumption or storage.

2126889441.name: santa-beard
2126889441.description: A santa beard. Ho Ho ho.

2133269020.name: red-berry-clone
2133269020.description: A clipping of a Red Berry Plant.

-194509282.name: butcher-knife
-194509282.description: A sharp butcher knife. Extremely good at harvesting flesh from both dead or alive bodies.

-765183617.name: double-barrel-shotgun
-765183617.description:
The Double Barrel Shotgun is a lower tier, close ranged weapon capable of one-hitting enemies within its effective range. It's best used in conjunction with other, longer range guns and against only one or two enemies at a time since it can only shoot two shells before requiring a lengthy reload. Furthermore, shots should only be made with it if it's likely that the majority of the pellets in a blast will connect with their target.

It makes for a strong early game weapon because of its relatively low cost. If the extra resources are available, it's a much safer and more reliable investment than the Waterpipe Shotgun since it's not as dependent on a single shot killing an enemy. Generally, unless going into an engagement that has large group of possible enemies (like a base raid or supply drop), it'll most likely be more cost effective to take a Double Barrel over a Pump Shotgun.

-75944661.name: eoka-pistol
-75944661.description:
The Eoka Pistol is a very cheap, very ineffective, and very unreliable firearm. It fires shotgun ammunition in a wide arc, and is capable of killing opponents in one hit (however unlikely that is).
The Eoka pistol consists of a spent 20mm cartridge with a small hole on top attached to a crude wooden frame. A shotgun shell is loaded into the 20mm shell, and a stone is scraped across the hole on top to produce a spark to fire the weapon.

-1215753368.name: flame-thrower
-1215753368.description:
The Flame Thrower (or flamethrower) is a close range weapon that also serves as a basic raiding tool. Fire sprayed from a flamethrower may obscure a target's vision and rapidly drain their health.

The Flame Thrower will start to steadily spawn fireballs once the trigger has been held long enough, and each one will damage and slow players or burn any wooden items they touch. Take care- fireballs spawned from spraying can and will burn bodies away (but their loot will fall in a bag if they do).

Raiding with a flamethrower is accomplished by continuously spraying a wooden structure with fire until it shatters. Structures without a base for the fireballs to land on are very inefficient to raid with a flamethrower, since fireballs will not damage the targeted area.

Many would not recommend using this as a weapon because of its low Damage Per Second, and short range. A good shotgun can outperform it in many situations.

-936921910.name: flashbang
-936921910.description: A bright explosive device which blinds and disorients anyone near it upon detonation

-1214542497.name: hmlmg
-1214542497.description: A hand-made belt-fed light machine gun with high damage, high rate of fire, and low accuracy during bursts. This craftable weapon serves as a direct craft item of the infamous m249, not quite as easy to control, slightly lower damage and fire-rate but rest assured, this is a weapon that still packs enough kick to cause some real damage.

-218009552.name: homing-missile-launcher
-218009552.description: An active-guidance homing missile launcher. Once launched, the target must be tracked by the launcher until impact. Can be distracted by flares.

-778367295.name: l96-rifle
-778367295.description: A military issue high powered rifle. Offers more accuracy at longer ranges than the Bolt Action at the tradeoff of being uncraftable. Obtained through APC and Locked crates.

-1812555177.name: lr-300-assault-rifle
-1812555177.description:
The LR-300 is a rare, military grade assault rifle. Dealing moderate-high damage combined with its low recoil and high ammo capacity render the LR-300 a weapon to be reckoned with. However, with its moderate rate of fire and relatively high spread, its use at long ranges may be of question.
It was previously considered to be one of the rarest weapons in the game, now much more readily available due to it's availability at the Bandit Camp's Black Market merchant.

-1469578201.name: longsword
-1469578201.description: A very powerful melee weapon. Whilst slow, it delivers a great amount of melee damage with each swing or poke.

-2069578888.name: m249
-2069578888.description: The M249 Light Machine Gun can only be found in Helicopter Crates and Bradley Crates. It has a magazine capacity of 100 5.56 bullets, the largest in the game. It does more damage than the Assault Rifle and has a slightly faster rate of fire while being way easier to control recoil-wise, allowing for very accurate and deadly bursts in long-range when coupled with a Holographic sight or an 8x scope.

-852563019.name: m92-pistol
-852563019.description: The M92 pistol is a powerful weapon with low recoil and high fire rate and damage. It can't be crafted by the player, rather it has to be found inside crates, or purchased from the Bandit Camp.

-1966748496.name: mace
-1966748496.description: Costing a negligible amount more than the machete, the mace offers far greater damage per swing at the cost of far less damage per second.

-1137865085.name: machete
-1137865085.description: A quick and medium damaging melee weapon. Swings fast and hits hard, useful for one last quick hit when in a close range battle and out of ammo.

-1123473824.name: multiple-grenade-launcher
-1123473824.description: A 40MM six barrel, semi automatic grenade launcher. Explosive, Shotgun and Smoke 40mm grenades can all be loaded into the launcher.

-1405508498.name: muzzle-boost
-1405508498.description: The Muzzle Boost increases the firing speed of weapons, though sacrificing some accuracy. Ideal for close-range combat with fully automatic firearms like the Assault Rifle or Custom SMG.

-1978999529.name: salvaged-cleaver
-1978999529.description:
A slow, but powerful melee weapon. This is decent for PVPing but it's main use comes at farming components.

The salvaged cleaver is one of the few melee weapons capable of destroying any barrel in a single hit. It is also fairly cheap, this makes it an ideal weapon to use when farming large amounts of barrels, especially if they are spread out.

-904863145.name: semi-automatic-rifle
-904863145.description: The Semi-Automatic Rifle is a staple of low quality weapons due to its high cost-efficiency. With its medium-tier damage, comparatively low recoil and high accuracy, the Semi-Automatic Rifle is the jack of all trades, but master of none.

-1850571427.name: silencer
-1850571427.description: The Silencer is a barrel attachment known to reduce gunfire sounds. It also removes the muzzle flash, giving you a good advantage during night without being spotted. It is quite useful against unaware enemies, and can allow you to get in extra hits before being spotted. Although the disadvantages can make short range battles go wrong. It is a good option for Bolt Action Rifles and L96s as the Silencer completely hides the bullet tracers, making the enemies confused where it came from, though it will reduce the velocity of the gun, meaning that you will need to aim a bit higher than usual to hit your opponent.

-855748505.name: simple-handmade-sight
-855748505.description: The Simple Handmade Sight is a makeshift alternative to a weapon's iron sights. Its reticle is simply a single post that comes to a sharp point - not too dissimilar from the German #1 reticle. This scope is particularly useful for close engagements as it provides the widest field of view out of all the scopes, but it is usually not practical at longer distances due to its negative magnification making distant targets appear smaller. Alternatively, it can be used when the weapon's iron sights are obscured by barrel attachments such as the Silencer or by the lighting caused by Fire Arrows.

-2073432256.name: skinning-knife
-2073432256.description: A sharp skinning knife. Extremely good at harvesting flesh and can produce trophies that can be mounted on Hunting Trophies.

-41440462.name: spas-12-shotgun
-41440462.description: Semi Automatic shotgun that fires much faster than the craftable Pump shotgun, losing to it in base damage. Houses 3 attachment slots and has an internal ammo capacity of 6 shots. Able to use any kind of shotgun ammo, including handmade shells. It is a rare military grade weapon, dropped rarely by the Military Tunnel Scientists and found only inside crates, spawned from in-game events as rewards for destroying the Bradley APC and the Patrol Helicopter. Can be rarely found inside a Supply Drop.

-1517740219.name: speargun
-1517740219.description: A speargun which can only be fired underwater. Excellent for hunting Sharks.

-1758372725.name: thompson
-1758372725.description:
The Thompson provides a mid-range alternative to other submachine guns while still offering close-range firepower. Its high accuracy and damage allow the user to take targets further away than other SMGs.

With the recent QoL update, the Thompson can now take underbarrel attachments, such as the Flashlight and Laser, marginally buffing it in comparison to the other SMGs.

-885833256.name: vampire-stake
-885833256.description: A stake adorned with special properties making it able to release the soul of undead creatures with a single strike, as well as yield extra loot from their remains.

-1815301988.name: water-pistol
-1815301988.description: A small water gun that doesn't require pumping, but has a lower range and output.

-1367281941.name: waterpipe-shotgun
-1367281941.description: The Waterpipe Shotgun is a low-tier gun that deals a decent amount of damage from close range. Can be loaded with the 12 Gauge Slug to deal less damage but shoot further. It is an early game weapon of choice for many and is often paired with a bow.

-132516482.name: weapon-lasersight
-132516482.description: The Weapon Lasersight serves as a welcome attachment to any weapon, with its only hindrance being the rarity of tech trash, and the possibility of a player tracing the laser back to its user. The reduced hip spread and aim sway makes it useful for weapons at close and distant ranges alike.

-1117626326.name: chainlink-fence
-1117626326.description: The chainlink fence is a fence that can be placed in a building frame. It can be used in a base as an extra barrier. Players and turrets are able to shoot through the fence.

-1950721390.name: concrete-barricade
-1950721390.description:
The Concrete Barricade is a deployable building component. It is the most costly and strongest of barricades. They are as about the width of a foundation and slightly higher than a crouching player.

Due to its low height, barricades are usually placed on higher ground than the opponent. Examples of usage include the top of a hill, roofs and towers. High External Walls take their intended use during combat.

-148794216.name: garage-door
-148794216.description: The garage door is a form of lockable door which slides upward from the bottom when opened. It fits within a wall frame, like the double door, but opens much slower than any other type of door. It is, however, more durable than the sheet metal double door - making it an effective loot room door.

-691113464.name: high-external-stone-gate
-691113464.description: The High External Stone Gate is used with High External Stone Walls as a door for a player's compound.

-967648160.name: high-external-stone-wall
-967648160.description: High External Stone Walls are generally used in the construction of compounds, and, unlike their wooden relatives, are fire-resistant and require explosives to get through unless you use a ladder, though this may prove difficult due to the damage and slow inflicted by the barbed wire on top of these walls. Both these and their wooden equivalents are also commonly used in pvp combat, as they can be carried in stacks of ten for some portable cover.

-335089230.name: high-external-wooden-gate
-335089230.description:
The High External Wooden Gate is a deployable building object used in conjunction with High External Wooden Walls to deny access to an area. The high external gate entrance is about the height and width of a standard 2x2 wall. While its total width is approximately 2.5 foundations wide.

The wall model comes with barbed wire but does not slow down or damage any players like its wall counterpart.

-985781766.name: high-ice-wall
-985781766.description: A very high ice wall to protect your property.

-850982208.name: key-lock
-850982208.description:
Key locks are used to lock doors, hatches, storage boxes and tool cupboards. Once placed it should be locked by activating it and selecting "Lock." For players other than the one who placed it to unlock it, they must have a key created by by the originating player.

To remove a lock, unlock it and pick it up.

-1100168350.name: large-water-catcher
-1100168350.description: The Large Water Catcher is a large deployable that collects water passively. This water can be used to re-hydrate players and water crops. The large water catcher is capable of holding up to 50,000 ml of water.

-148229307.name: metal-shop-front
-148229307.description:
The metal shop front is quite useful for trading. The vendor can stand safely behind it without worrying about getting shot, as the glass is bulletproof. When the player on the inside and the player on the outside have put in items to make the desired trade, they both have to accept the deal for the items to be transferred.

As the Metal Shop Front has similar durability to a sheet metal wall, along with bulletproof glass, it can be used as a safe window to spy on neighbors at higher levels of a base.

-1199897172.name: metal-vertical-embrasure
-1199897172.description: Placed over a window it is used to reduce the size and grants the player more cover than the window. It is the counterpart to the Metal Horizontal Embrasure providing more protection and the player's reducing vision from the left and right sides of the window.

-819720157.name: metal-window-bars
-819720157.description: The Metal Window Bars are the mid-tier window bars, provide little cover and deny entrance through windows. They are stronger than their wooden counterpart.

-1199897169.name: metal-horizontal-embrasure
-1199897169.description: Placed over a window it is used to reduce the size and grants the player more cover than the window. It is the counterpart to the Metal Vertical Embrasure providing more protection and the player's reducing vision from above and below the window.

-956706906.name: prison-cell-gate
-956706906.description:
The prison cell gate is a door that fits into a wall frame.

It is unique in that autoturrets and flame turrets can shoot through it.
It opens by sliding to the side, leaving the other side accessible.

It is worth noting that chests can be accessed through a
cell gate, so it is not suited for loot rooms.

-1429456799.name: prison-cell-wall
-1429456799.description: A prison cell wall. Cannot be picked up after placed.

-1130709577.name: pump-jack
-1130709577.description: The Pump Jack is currently a non-craftable item. Its original intended purpose was to allow players to harvest Crude Oil and Low Grade Fuel similar to the Quarry. It can only be found on the map near the Power Plant, Train Yard, and Water Treatment monuments. Pump Jacks can be loaded with Diesel Fuel.

-559599960.name: sandbag-barricade
-559599960.description:
The Sandbag Barricade is a deployable building component. It is the most cost effective of barricades. They are as about the width of a foundation and slightly higher than a crouching player.

Due to its low height, barricades are usually placed on higher ground than the opponent. Examples of usage include the top of a hill, roofs and towers. High External Walls take their intended use during combat.

-2067472972.name: sheet-metal-door
-2067472972.description: The Sheet Metal Door is the most common door found on bases due to its resistances to melee weapons and fire but relatively cheap cost to craft. Regardless, it is still relatively weak to explosives compared to its expensive indirect upgrade, the 'Armoured Door'.

-796583652.name: shop-front
-796583652.description: A shop front to do commerce.

-132247350.name: small-water-catcher
-132247350.description:
The Small Water Catcher is a deployable that collects water passively. It's useful to keep a solo player or small group hydrated without having to leave their base. The catcher is capable of holding 10,000 ml of water.

Catchers receive collection bonuses during weather events such as rain, snow, and fog.

-1614955425.name: strengthened-glass-window
-1614955425.description: Bulleproof window glass, can block any incoming bullet projectile. Cannot block explosives.

-97956382.name: tool-cupboard
-97956382.description:
The Tool Cupboard is essential for any base because it prevents people who are not authorized from upgrading building blocks and placing and picking up deployables within a 25-meter radius (around 9 foundation blocks) from the cupboard. If you press 'E' on the cupboard you can authorize yourself so you are able to build in this area. If you hold 'E' on the cupboard you can clear the list of players authorized including yourself. Any player authorized from the cupboard will not be targeted by any flame turrets or shotgun traps within the cupboard's radius.

Tool Cupboards can be locked with Key and Code Locks in order to disallow players from authorizing themselves without a passcode.

-463122489.name: watch-tower
-463122489.description:
A place-able tower that can be used to help hold positions.
Cannot be placed on foundations
Relatively resistant to gunfire, but falls reasonably fast to melee weapons or weapon throws.

-1336109173.name: wood-double-door
-1336109173.description:
A Cheap door to secure your base. Its vulnerability to fire and weak explosive resistance makes the door a temporary solution to securing your base. Due to its flaws you should look at upgrading to a higher tier door such as Sheet Metal.

The Wooden Door can take two kinds of locks the basic Key Lock and the Code Lock. To pick up the door, remove any locks and open, hold down the E (USE) key and select 'Pickup'.

-1023374709.name: wood-shutters
-1023374709.description:
Wooden Shutters are deployable items that can only be placed on windows. They provide the ability to selectively allow or disallow the open state of the window they are placed on which can be used to deny outside players from firing bullets inside the building. In addition, these shutters cannot be locked, allowing either players from inside or outside to open and close them freely so long as they are within reach.


As a result, window shutters are usually used on a high floor of a building, which only allows players from the inside to have easy access to them. It should be noted that placing window shutters will grant raiders the ability to know which windows you are actively using to shoot them from if you are closing them after you are done using them.

-1151332840.name: wooden-frontier-bar-doors
-1151332840.description: Hand-carved, rugged bar doors embody the spirit of the frontier. A must-have for any survivor.

-316250604.name: wooden-ladder
-316250604.description: A ladder will help you climb walls in any base.

-1183726687.name: wooden-window-bars
-1183726687.description: The Wooden Window Bars are the lowest-tier window bars, provide little cover and deny entrance through windows. They are weaker over its reinforced and metal counterparts. Due to its weakness to fire damage and low health higher tier window bars are recommended.

-2027793839.name: advent-calendar
-2027793839.description: Receive a special gift each and every day!

-1274093662.name: bath-tub-planter
-1274093662.description: A small planter with enough room to plant 3 seeds.

-1273339005.name: bed
-1273339005.description:
The bed can be used as a spawn point, just like the sleeping bag, but it has reduced cooldown use; instead of waiting 5 minutes like the Sleeping Bag, you just wait 2 minutes.

You should have a bed if your base is upgraded and quite decent, because if you are getting raided and you have to respawn to defend your base, you cannot afford 5 minutes of respawn delay.

-1519126340.name: drop-box
-1519126340.description:
The drop box is a device mountable on any wall so long as there is nothing else on that wall such as lamps or another drop box. The front of the drop box is typically placed on the exterior of a building, so that items may be deposited safely to anyone on the other side.

The drop box does not require the operation of more than one person, but it will fill up if someone on the rear end does not empty it from time to time, which will disallow you from depositing more items. Be careful to make sure the correct side is facing you when you deploy it, as it may be annoying to remove and place again if you make a mistake.

-979302481.name: easter-door-wreath
-979302481.description: A beautiful, hand crafted Easter themed door wreath.

-1230433643.name: festive-double-doorway-garland
-1230433643.description: A Festive decoration to spruce up your double doorway during the holidays!

-1379835144.name: festive-window-garland
-1379835144.description: A Festive decoration to spruce up your windows during the holidays!

-1913996738.name: fish-trophy
-1913996738.description: A wall mountable item to show off your greatest catches. Fish not included.

-52398594.name: frontier-horns-single-item-rack
-52398594.description: Artfully display your weapon with a handcrafted wall-mounted single weapon rack.

-849373693.name: frontier-horseshoe-single-item-rack
-849373693.description: Artfully display your weapon with a handcrafted wall-mounted single weapon rack.

-1999722522.name: furnace
-1999722522.description: The furnace is the cheapest item for smelting metal and sulfur ore.

-1442559428.name: hobo-barrel
-1442559428.description:
Hobo Barrel is a large campfire that can be seen in certain monuments. It functions just like campfires and require wood as fuel, you can also cook food on it. It cannot be destroyed or picked up. Standing near a burning hobo barrel gives comfort. Because of the invincibility it has, admins are most likely to spawn hobo barrels to block off places that players are not supposed to reach (out of bounds, places glitching out, etc..)

It was once obtainable during the January 2021 Twitch Drop, it is now unobtainable and only admins or players that own the hobo barrels can place it.

-246672609.name: horizontal-weapon-rack
-246672609.description: Artfully display your arsenal with a handcrafted wall-mounted weapon rack.

-143132326.name: huge-wooden-sign
-143132326.description: This is the largest sign available. You can paint on this sign using the in-game editor. Signs are useful for indicating shop prices and more.

-1824943010.name: jack-o-lantern-happy
-1824943010.description: A Lantern. Place it where you need light.

-845557339.name: landscape-picture-frame
-845557339.description: A landscape oriented canvas for artists paintings.

-1992717673.name: large-furnace
-1992717673.description:
The Large Furnace is used for smelting larger quantities of ore, faster than a regular furnace.
The ores that can be smelted using a Large Furnace are: Metal Ore, Sulfur Ore and High Quality Metal Ore.
Wood is used as the fuel for smelting and the Large Furnace holds 2 stacks of wood for up to 2000 total.
There are 5 slots for raw materials so a total of 5000 ore can be smelted at once.
There are 5 output slots which will fill with your finished product and charcoal.

The Large Furnace must be placed on terrain and takes up 4 square foundations space.
The Large Furnace cannot be placed on foundations or floors.

-110921842.name: locker
-110921842.description: The locker allows you to quickly remove items off your player into the locker. Pressing the "Swap" button inside the locker will remove all 7 clothing slots and all 6 active items. You can have three different sets of clothing/gear in the locker.

-586784898.name: mail-box
-586784898.description:
The mail box can be placed just about anywhere and have a special compartment that can only accept notes and cassettes.

Players without building privileges will only be shown one slot for the note or cassette they are about to leave. Players with building privileges can open it to gain access to any items left inside.

When an item is left then the small red flag on the side of the mail box is raised to indicate at a glance that something is inside. Once the mail box is accessed by a player with building privileges then the red flag will lower, regardless of whether the mail box is emptied or not.

-1819233322.name: medium-wooden-sign
-1819233322.description: A 2-meter by 1-meter wooden sign that you can write on.

-1832422579.name: one-sided-town-sign-post
-1832422579.description: A one sided town sign post, that you can plant into terrain.

-1651220691.name: pookie-bear
-1651220691.description:
The pookie bear is probably your best friend during holiday season. Not only will it not betray you, it will also cheer you whenever you want him too!

When you are near him 100% comfort effect is being applied to you, thus allowing you to slowly heal to 100HP when your hunger is above 100 points, and you are not dying from dehydration or bleeding.

-1370759135.name: portrait-picture-frame
-1370759135.description: A portrait oriented canvas for artists paintings.

-1861522751.name: research-table
-1861522751.description: The research table is a craftable deployable item that is used for researching obtained items for a price. This can be done by pressing the 'E' key, inserting your item and the required scrap metal to acquire a blueprint for use at the appropriate tier of workbench. (note: blueprint is guaranteed unlike previous versions of rust).

-1863063690.name: rocking-chair
-1863063690.description: A rocking chair that responds to your input. Don't fire whilst seated.

-1985799200.name: rug
-1985799200.description: The rug is found in Barrel around the rust island and provides comfort while near it. Comfort is a beneficial effect that is applied whenever the player is close to comfortable items. While under its effect, the player regenerates health (more quickly), Hunger is depleted significantly faster and Radiation Poisoning has less effect. The amount of comfort is determined by the Comfort providing item and the amount of players nearby.

-1104881824.name: rug-bear-skin
-1104881824.description: Bear Rug skin that can be placed on most walls, floors, and ceilings. Note: If placed on a ceiling, standing directly below its head/neck will provide 100% comfort, even when alone.

-465682601.name: super-stocking
-465682601.description:
A special christmas-styled 'container' that generates various goodies after 2 to 3 in-game nights. It must be placed on a player-made structure in order for it to generate items. Quite useful, but you can't depend on it too much due to its RNG nature, thus making it more useful as a small supplement to your resources.

When an item has spawned inside it, the top of the Stocking shall glow bright yellow and have tiny stars flow out on the sides.

Limited availability. Acquired through upgrading Regular Stockings, which are found in special Christmas presents, spawning only during the Christmas time of the year obviously.

-1754948969.name: sleeping-bag
-1754948969.description:
A sleeping bag is a critical part of playing Rust. When placed, this item offers a respawn point directly on top of it. It can be named, given to a friend, or even be picked up by it's owner by using the interact key on it.

After death, a menu will appear displaying your sleeping bags and beds by name and you can select whichever one you need. After being used, or being placed, there is a 5-minute cooldown period before being able to spawn on it.

When possible, you should upgrade your base's respawn point to a bed, which has a drastically shorter cooldown timer.

-869598982.name: small-hunting-trophy
-869598982.description: A trophy stand to mount the head of killed animals or enemies.

-1293296287.name: small-oil-refinery
-1293296287.description:
The Small Oil Refinery is used to refine low grade fuel from crude oil. Each crude oil produces 3 low grade fuel. The cost of the refinery is quite expensive but can prove to be worth its cost in the long run.

Note: As of January 18 2018, the Small Oil Refinery produces charcoal.

-369760990.name: small-stash
-369760990.description:
Small stashes are a very useful tool in the early game, especially when saving enough resources to build a starter base, or hiding your key to your door.

Place it where you want it, fill it with up to 6 different items or stacks of items, and interact with it to bury it. After staring at the stash's general location for a couple of seconds, the stash will rise out of the ground and will be able to be accessed again.

-1138208076.name: small-wooden-sign
-1138208076.description: This is the smallest sign available. You can paint on the sign using the in-game image editor. Signs are useful for indicating prices for shops and more.

-555122905.name: sofa
-555122905.description: A comfortable old sofa. A decorative item which provides comfort and seats two.

-1100422738.name: spinning-wheel
-1100422738.description: The spinning wheel, when placed, allows any authorized player to paint the wheel. Players may spin the wheel, landing on a randomized location. There is no practical use for the wheel beyond that of roleplaying, gambling, or aesthetics.

-1535621066.name: stone-fireplace
-1535621066.description: A stone fireplace to heat your home. Must be placed indoors and against a wall.

-1421257350.name: storage-barrel-horizontal
-1421257350.description: Keep your things in this wooden barrel. Stores up to 48 items. Cannot be locked.

-1478445584.name: tuna-can-lamp
-1478445584.description:
A Makeshift wall light.

Can be attached to walls only. Runs on Low Grade Fuel and consumes 1 per 10 minutes.

-901370585.name: twitch-rivals-trophy-2023
-901370585.description: A trophy dedicated to the survivors of Rust Twitch Rivals 2023

-1647846966.name: two-sided-ornate-hanging-sign
-1647846966.description: A double sided hanging sign, to attach to buildings.

-1344017968.name: wanted-poster
-1344017968.description: A poster that can display a given player's face as wanted.

-1863559151.name: water-barrel
-1863559151.description:
The water barrel is a container used to store excess water for later. It is capable of holding up to 20,000 ml of water at a time.
After farming 2.0 update,water barrel can give water to other items through the water pipe

-96256997.name: wide-weapon-rack
-96256997.description: Artfully display your arsenal with a handcrafted wall-mounted weapon rack.

-180129657.name: wood-storage-box
-180129657.description:
A Wood Storage Box is a small box with the ability to store a maximum of 18 separate items or stacks of items inside of it. These can often times be used as a more space efficient way to store your items than the Large Wood Box, but can prove difficult to keep sorted as not all of your items are in one container.

They can have both locks and codelocks placed on them to keep unwanted newmans at bay for a brief period. If destroyed, they will destroy a portion of their contents as well. Boxes can be placed on shelves to save space.

-41896755.name: workbench-level-2
-41896755.description: The tier 2 Work bench allows you to craft mid-game weapons, armor, and building parts while in the vicinity of the work bench. Uses the same amount of space like the Tier One Workbench

-1607980696.name: workbench-level-3
-1607980696.description: The tier 3 Work Bench allows you to craft the highest tier of weapons, armor, and defenses.

-996185386.name: xl-picture-frame
-996185386.description: An extra large canvas for artists paintings.

-1018587433.name: animal-fat
-1018587433.description: Fat is a good package for biological energy, making it quite an effective fuel source. It can be taken from any animal, including humans.

-1938052175.name: charcoal
-1938052175.description: Charcoal is the byproduct of wood when used for smelting in a campfire or furnace. It is used in conjunction with sulfur to craft gunpowder, a key ingredient for ammunition and explosives. Though it may be tempting to throw charcoal away, large quantities will be required in later stages of the game. Keep it if you can.

-858312878.name: cloth
-858312878.description: Cloth is a basic resource that has several means of being harvested. Most commonly it is farmed with hemp and hemp seeds, but can be gathered from animals and even cacti with the appropriate tools. It is used primarily for clothing, and the refining of low grade when combined with animal fat. To make cloth gathering a trivial task, the proper use of planters is recommended.

-321733511.name: crude-oil
-321733511.description: Raw Oil out of the ground, must be refined in a refinery to be used. Can be found in barrels scattered across the map.

-1557377697.name: empty-tuna-can
-1557377697.description:
After consuming a tuna can, you'll be left with its empty remains.
Empty tuna cans are used for either smelting them into a few Metal Fragments, or to make the Tuna Can Lamp.

-592016202.name: explosives
-592016202.description: Explosives are used in more powerful raiding devices. They cannot be used on their own, only as an ingredient.

-930193596.name: fertilizer
-930193596.description: Helps plants grow by increasing ground condition. Produced in a composter.

-265876753.name: gun-powder
-265876753.description:
Gunpowder is a resource created by combining smelted sulfur and charcoal. It is used for multiple things from rockets, grenades, ammunition, and even land mines.

As this is used almost exclusively for PvP purposes, this is a much sought after resource and should be protected and seized at every opportunity.

-1982036270.name: high-quality-metal-ore
-1982036270.description: A rock containing High Quality Metal. Can be smelted in a furnace.

-946369541.name: low-grade-fuel
-946369541.description: Low Grade Fuel is a resource made from Animal Fat and Cloth. It is required early game to make furnaces and mid game for Syringes. There are three ways to get this, hunting animals (or to a lesser effect, humans) and crafting it, refining crude oil at a monument or personal refinery, and finding it in oil barrels (or to a lesser effect in mine carts).

-4031221.name: metal-ore
-4031221.description: Metal ore can be smelted into metal fragments through a furnace which is used to craft most of the tools, structures, items and weaponry throughout the game and is vital to have during most of the time being.

-1779183908.name: paper
-1779183908.description: Paper used to be an ingredient to make notes, now only wood is required and paper has been since forgotten, maybe it will come back in the future to be used in other crafting.

-804769727.name: plant-fiber
-804769727.description: Fiber from dead plants. Can be composted.

-544317637.name: research-paper
-544317637.description: Research Paper Used to be used in research to create items, this is no longer the case and scrap is used for researching items.

-277057363.name: salt-water
-277057363.description: Salt water is similar to normal water, but it does more harm than good and is gathered from the sea. Drinking salt water will make you vomit, losing health and hydration. Salt water can be purified using a water purifier.

-932201673.name: scrap
-932201673.description:
Resource mainly used for researching items into blueprints at workbenches or going down the tech tree, which allows for targeting certain items you want to acquire.

It's also a type of currency, used for trading various items at the Scientist Outpost and the Bandit Camp. As such, Scrap is very valuable and essential at any point in the game.

-2099697608.name: stones
-2099697608.description: Stones are an abundant and vital resource as they can be earned from any node and have the best cost-to-protection ratio for base building.

-1581843485.name: sulfur
-1581843485.description: One of the most valuable and sought after resources in rust, sulfur is useful to almost all players (with the exception of freshspawns) due to it being required to craft gunpowder, a resource necessary to create ammo as well as any explosive. It can be found in its ore form in sulfur nodes, identifiable by their distinct yellow colouring. This then needs to be smelted in a furnace in order to obtain its purified form seen here.

-1157596551.name: sulfur-ore
-1157596551.description: Sulfur ore is a resource found in Sulfur nodes. Smelting sulfur ore in any furnace will give sulfur, an ingredient in crafting gunpowder.

-1779180711.name: water
-1779180711.description:
Water can be used to regain thirst, heal yourself and remove radiation poisoning.

You can either get it from water collectors, drink it from rivers, streams and lakes or from water bottles found in the ration loot boxes.

-151838493.name: wood
-151838493.description: Wood is possibly the most basic resource in the game. It is used for laying out twig structures, fuel for furnaces/campfires, early stage armor and weapons, furniture/storage, and so on. It is gathered relatively quickly, but is consumed very fast.

-1215166612.name: a-barrel-costume
-1215166612.description: A stupid barrel costume, so you can hide like a pro..p

-470439097.name: arctic-suit
-470439097.description: An arctic variant of the hazmat suit which trades radiation for cold protection.

-702051347.name: bandana-mask
-702051347.description: Cheap facial attire compatible with most head slots that wouldn't otherwise obscure it.

-1622110948.name: bandit-guard-gear
-1622110948.description: A Bandit Guard Suit worn by the guards at bandit camp. Unobtainable during normal gameplay, it can only be acquired through console by admins.

-1022661119.name: baseball-cap
-1022661119.description: Equivalent stats to beenie hat while costing less and requiring the steam item.

-1211268013.name: basic-horse-shoes
-1211268013.description: Equipping these horse shoes will grant your horse additional movement speed

-1903165497.name: bone-helmet
-1903165497.description: Second only to the wolf headdress in primitive headwear, the bone helmet is a welcome sink for bone frags until metal can take its place.

-23994173.name: boonie-hat
-23994173.description: Equivalent stats and cost to burlap headwrap, but can be combined with the bandana.

-1549739227.name: boots
-1549739227.description:
The limited available clothing slots often force a player to choose between boots, gloves, and bandanas, with the superior stats of the boots usually giving it priority.

It should be noted that the boots provide protection for the entirety of the legs, rather than the feet alone.

-1004426654.name: bunny-ears
-1004426654.description: Bunny Ears. Grants additional Egg Vision allowing you to detect more eggs during an Easter egg hunt.

-1266045928.name: bunny-onesie
-1266045928.description: A Bunny Onesie. Grants additional Egg Vision allowing you to detect more eggs during an Easter egg hunt.

-761829530.name: burlap-shoes
-761829530.description: Burlap shoes are a peice of clothing that goes on the feet, Burlap shoes also are the quietest, making footsteps harder to hear. This could provide an advantage to close range fighting when it comes to flanking or ambushing.

-152332823.name: chicken-costume
-152332823.description: An inflatable chicken costume. Acting as a replacement for wooden pants, you can equip this item to look as silly as possible.

-803263829.name: coffee-can-helmet
-803263829.description: The coffee can helmet is a face protector that is one tier below the metal facemask, it offers good protection against physical damage to the head and costs less to craft than its older and better brother, the metal facemask.

-113413047.name: diving-mask
-113413047.description: A Diving Mask. Provides clear vision under water.

-2022172587.name: diving-tank
-2022172587.description: The Diving Tank is a tank of air used for staying underwater for extended periods of time, 10 minutes to be exact. After this is up, you will need to refill it at a workbench. This item must be worn to work, and occupies the top torso layer (usually where chest armor goes). Note that wearing the tank while not underwater will not deplete the oxygen supply.

-1323101799.name: double-horse-saddle
-1323101799.description: A horse saddle with two seats. Having this item allows you to claim a horse in a stable by holding E and selecting the 'Claim' option

-258574361.name: dracula-cape
-258574361.description: A robustly thick outer garment providing ample protection to the wearer.

-22883916.name: dragon-mask
-22883916.description: A special dragon mask to celebrate Chinese New Year.

-747743875.name: egg-suit
-747743875.description: An eggsquisite egg costume, can be painted when unequipped.

-1000573653.name: frog-boots
-1000573653.description: Added for anyone who owned the game while it was in Early Access. Provides more rad protection than other early game clothes, making it slightly OP.

-1043618880.name: ghost-costume
-1043618880.description: Definitely not a last minute costume idea.

-558880549.name: gingerbread-suit
-558880549.description: A suit made of gingerbread, slightly crunchy.

-690276911.name: glowing-eyes
-690276911.description: Lighting effect used for the Halloween 2017 Murderer NPCs.

-1569700847.name: headset
-1569700847.description: Every gamer needs a headset! - Gained from Rust's first Twitch drop event.

-297099594.name: heavy-frankenstein-head
-297099594.description:
Slightly slower, slightly stronger.

Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

-2024549027.name: heavy-frankenstein-legs
-2024549027.description:
Slightly slower, slightly stronger.

Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

-1102429027.name: heavy-plate-jacket
-1102429027.description:
A high-tier protective item that will protect the user from a large portion of the damage dealt by most sources at the price of a movement penalty. It will also amplify the effects of cold and heat damage on the player, making it a situational item.

This item also disables the ability to aim down sights on weapons.

-1778159885.name: heavy-plate-pants
-1778159885.description: An high-tier protective item that will protect the user from a large portion of the damage dealt by most sources at the price of a movement penalty. It will also amplify the effects of cold and heat damage on the player, making it a situational item.

-1772746857.name: heavy-scientist-suit
-1772746857.description: A Heavy Scientist Suit worn by the heavy scientists which are spawned at the oil rigs. Unobtainable during normal gameplay, it can only be acquired through console by admins.

-1773144852.name: hide-skirt
-1773144852.description: Statistically equivalent to burlap trousers. Doesn't mesh very well with most torso attire.

-1997543660.name: horse-saddle
-1997543660.description: Having this item allows you to claim a horse in a stable by holding E and selecting the 'Claim' option

-1989600732.name: hot-air-balloon-armor
-1989600732.description: Armor for the Hot Air Balloon

-2012470695.name: improvised-balaclava
-2012470695.description: Essentially acting as an upgrade to the burlap headwrap, the balaclava's most distinguished aspect is its ability to resist cold. Because it is bound to containers and lacks stats significant enough to warrant researching, the balaclava is not often seen.

-1163532624.name: jacket
-1163532624.description: Though not as widely employed as its wooden counterpart, the jacket bridges the gap dividing the aforementioned and road sign. It offers superior projectile resistance to its predecessors, and founds the melee resistance that will remain static up through to the metal chest plate.

-907422733.name: large-backpack
-907422733.description: A large, military issued backpack that lets you carry 28 extra items.

-134959124.name: light-frankenstein-head
-134959124.description:
Slightly faster, slightly weaker.

Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

-1624770297.name: light-frankenstein-torso
-1624770297.description:
Slightly faster, slightly weaker.

Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

-1732475823.name: medium-frankenstein-head
-1732475823.description:
A balanced head.

Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

-194953424.name: metal-facemask
-194953424.description: A high-tier protective face mask which somehow protects the entire head. It costs High Quality Metal, making it quite expensive compared to its alternatives, but in return offers the greatest protection to almost all forms of physical damage in exchange for decreasing cold protection.

-1539025626.name: miners-hat
-1539025626.description: The miner's hat is capable of doing all that the candle hat can, but with greater resistances to boot. It is, however, much easier to gauge where a player is looking if their light is on.

-1518883088.name: night-vision-goggles
-1518883088.description: Enables vision at nighttime by projecting and amplifying infrared light.The batteries can be recharged at a Lvl 2 workbench. Cannot be worn with a helmet.

-575744869.name: party-hat
-575744869.description: A very stupid looking party hat.

-892718768.name: prisoner-hood
-892718768.description: A hood for prisoners, restricts vision.

-986782031.name: rabbit-mask
-986782031.description: A Beautifully crafted Rabbit mask to celebrate the 2023 Lunar New Year

-324675402.name: reindeer-antlers
-324675402.description: The Reindeer Antlers are festive headgear that can be found in small presents. Its comparable to wearing Burlap Headwrap.

-2002277461.name: road-sign-jacket
-2002277461.description: The road sign jacket has become the staple of mid-game armor due primarily to its worthwhile projectile resistance without necessitating high quality metal.

-699558439.name: roadsign-gloves
-699558439.description: Gloves made out of metal offers a good amount of protection to the upper body.

-575483084.name: santa-hat
-575483084.description: A santa hat that can be found in christmas presents during the end of the year.

-253079493.name: scientist-suit
-253079493.description: A piece of clothing worn by the Scientist NPCs. Although it is an unobtainable item, it can be spawned in by an admin.

-2025184684.name: shirt
-2025184684.description: Container equivalent of hide vest. Meshes poorly with most leg attire. Default skin camouflages well at night.

-1695367501.name: shorts
-1695367501.description: With identical stats to the burlap trousers and hide skirt in spite of its increased cloth cost, crafting the shorts is a choice of aesthetic over function.

-48090175.name: snow-jacket
-48090175.description: An article of clothing that takes up the chest slot for both clothes and armor. It is recommended for anyone who lives in the snow, though not being able to wear armor is very detrimental.

-842267147.name: snowman-helmet
-842267147.description: A snowman helmet which provides ample protection.

-1785231475.name: surgeon-scrubs
-1785231475.description:
This surgeon suit is craftable if you own the item on Steam, and, in terms of ballistic protection, makes a great alternative for the Hazmat Suit due to not requiring a researched blueprint, and having a decent, mid-tier overall body protection in one piece, rather than separate pieces of clothing to cover all areas, for a relatively cheap crafting cost.

It has no real specialisation, other than a decent radiation protection (which still doesn't compete with the hazmat suit) that allows you to go in most places. Therefore, it's really just the fact it's a cool-looking surgeon suit, and offers fair overall protection.

For combat purposes, the Surgeon Scrubs positions itself in the mid-tier segment, directly next to armaments such as the Bone Armor kit, Hazmat Suit, and commonly put together clothes sets that lack any specialized pieces of armor.

-1108136649.name: tactical-gloves
-1108136649.description: Military issue tactical gloves provide protection as well as weapon stabilization leading to higher accuracy when used.

-1101924344.name: wetsuit
-1101924344.description:
The Wetsuit is used for staying dry while swimming in water.

If a player is wearing a wetsuit, they will never get the 'WET' effect.
It is especially helpful for swimming in colder regions as it takes much longer to dry in the cold.
It also has a huge 15% radiation resistance which can be useful for new players in radtowns.

-1478212975.name: wolf-headdress
-1478212975.description:
Scavenging the wolf skull necessary to produce this headdress won't be easy, but it pays for itself and then some with the resistances it grants; phenomenal melee and explosive protection, excellent projectile defense, and a pleasant resistance to cold makes this thing a primitive powerhouse.

If that weren't enough, its ability to combine with the bandana can push it even further beyond its already unbelievable state. Treasure these.

-2094954543.name: wood-armor-helmet
-2094954543.description: Though not significant, the wood armor helmet differentiates itself from its cloth counterparts with its superior melee resistance.

-1262185308.name: binoculars
-1262185308.description: Binoculars are a cost-efficient way to spy on your unaware neighbors, or get a clear view of the surrounding land. They provide three levels of magnification (changed with the left mouse button), including one level far stronger than the zoom of a 4x scope. Cheap, easy to use, and can be a lifesaver when used by a smart and careful player.

-1316706473.name: camera
-1316706473.description: A camera. Take screenshots with primary fire, zoom in and out with secondary fire, and lock focus with third fire.

-1707425764.name: fishing-tackle
-1707425764.description:
The Fishing Tackle is a quest item, it is found inside the fisherman's toolbox near the coast of the Fishing Village, it appears when you start the quest.

It currently has no use in game.

-196667575.name: flashlight
-196667575.description: A powerful flashlight which illuminates your surroundings and can be used as a weapon.

-1252059217.name: hatchet
-1252059217.description: This tool is a must-have for any Rust player. It is the most efficient tool when gathering wood and harvesting animals. Relatively cheap and durable, this tool should be what you aim for in the early stages of the game.

-2001260025.name: instant-camera
-2001260025.description: An instant camera. Take photos with primary fire, zoom in and out with secondary fire, and change focus mode with reload. Photographs can be viewed by clicking on them in your inventory. Photographs can also be put into picture frames.

-1302129395.name: pickaxe
-1302129395.description: An improved gathering rate is offset by a significantly longer gather speed, though it is nonetheless considered far superior to its stone counterpart. It is as efficient as the salvaged ice pick but just a bit slower.

-262590403.name: salvaged-axe
-262590403.description: The Salvaged Axe is the upgraded version of the hatchet. It collects more wood and breaks down the trees faster. It has a slower swing speed than the hatchet so some people prefer the hatchet over it.

-1506397857.name: salvaged-hammer
-1506397857.description:
Essentially an upgraded rock, the Salvaged Hammer is capable of gathering just about anything, but is not as good as an axe or pickaxe for gathering their respective resources.
The Salvaged Hammer is the best tool for quickly melee raiding the sheet metal door, taking only 28 minutes, 10 seconds and 24 salvaged hammers.

-1780802565.name: salvaged-icepick
-1780802565.description: The Salvaged Icepick distinguished itself from the pick line due to its superior gather speed at the cost of valuable components.

-1878475007.name: satchel-charge
-1878475007.description:
The Satchel Charge is a midgame raiding tool that can be used to destroy player-made buildings for the purpose of entering and looting another player's base.

The Satchel charge becomes armed when placed, has a random time until detonation, and has a small chance to malfunction, requiring the user to pick up and rearm the Charge. Note that sometimes the charge will re-ignite when the dud is picked up, going off with a very short fuse!

-1536855921.name: shovel
-1536855921.description: A shovel for digging up stuff

-596876839.name: spray-can
-596876839.description: Use the Spray Can to leave Tags or reskin your items. Press [attack] to spray and [attack2] to reskin items.

-1583967946.name: stone-hatchet
-1583967946.description: The Stone Hatchet is a primitive, early game tool used for collecting wood and flesh. It is available to craft, costing only wood and stones. Players starting out may find great use of the Stone Hatchet along with the Stone Pickaxe to aid in their farming endeavors. Although it is much less efficient than the Hatchet or Salvaged Axe, it is still used commonly due to its low barrier of entry- not costing any processed materials which require a furnace.

-1432674913.name: anti-radiation-pills
-1432674913.description:
Anti-Rad pills are used to remove radiation. Use them after you get radiation sickness not before you go into a radiation zone. Anti-Radiation pills can also be traded at the Bandit Camp for scrap.

Beware that radiation pills cause significant dehydration.

-2072273936.name: bandage
-2072273936.description:
Bandages are crafted medical supplies that stop bleeding and heal a small amount of health.

It is common to chain-use bandages when the player has no access to other medical supplies, as hemp can be picked while running around the map and used for an easy health boost.

-1729415579.name: adv.-anti-rad-tea
-1729415579.description: A tea that reduces the amount of health lost due to radiation.

-2123125470.name: advanced-healing-tea
-2123125470.description: A tea that restores health over time.

-541206665.name: advanced-wood-tea
-541206665.description: A tea that increases the amount of wood you receive from trees.

-487356515.name: anti-rad-tea
-487356515.description: A tea that reduces the amount of health lost due to radiation.

-929092070.name: basic-healing-tea
-929092070.description: A tea that restores health over time.

-1184406448.name: basic-max-health-tea
-1184406448.description: A tea that increases your maximum health.

-649128577.name: basic-wood-tea
-649128577.description: A tea that increases the amount of wood you receive from trees.

-586342290.name: blueberries
-586342290.description: A rare food item acquired from food crates (not to be confused with ration boxes) found in monuments randomly. They restore one 1/10th of your health and give a balanced amount hydration and calories. Just like the black raspberries, they are best to be used during combat, additionally as supplements to a medical syringe to greatly improve the healing received.

-989755543.name: burnt-bear-meat
-989755543.description: Burnt Bear Meat is the product of overcooking Bear Meat inside of a Campfire or a Barbecue. Consuming the meat will slightly increase your health and hunger.

-78533081.name: burnt-deer-meat
-78533081.description: Burned Deer Meat Eating it will damage your health.

-682687162.name: burnt-human-meat
-682687162.description: Burnt Human Meat is made by overcooking Human Meat. It is not recommended to eat due to the high cost in hydration for a negligible boost to hunger. Should be thrown away unless the player is extremely desperate for food, and has access to a large/infinite amount of water.

-700591459.name: can-of-beans
-700591459.description: Beans found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

-1941646328.name: can-of-tuna
-1941646328.description: Chunked tuna found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

-587989372.name: catfish
-587989372.description: A large, whiskered fresh water based predator. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.

-965336208.name: chocolate-bar
-965336208.description: Chocolate Bar found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

-1848736516.name: cooked-chicken
-1848736516.description: Cooked chicken is obtained by cooking Raw Chicken Breast. You can eat it to restore hunger and a little bit of hydration.

-1509851560.name: cooked-deer-meat
-1509851560.description: Cooked Deer Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

-1162759543.name: cooked-horse-meat
-1162759543.description: Cooked Horse Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

-242084766.name: cooked-pork
-242084766.description: Cooked pork, Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

-778875547.name: corn-clone
-778875547.description: A Clipping of a Corn Plant.

-746030907.name: granola-bar
-746030907.description: Granola Bar found as loot. Eating it provides a small boost to health, hunger, and thirst.

-1305326964.name: green-berry-clone
-1305326964.description: A clipping of a Green Berry Plant.

-1776128552.name: green-berry-seed
-1776128552.description:
These green berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

-568419968.name: grub
-568419968.description: A pale, fleshy insect that can be used for bait. Could also be eaten in desperate situations.

-886280491.name: hemp-clone
-886280491.description: A clipping of a hemp plant.

-237809779.name: hemp-seed
-237809779.description:
Hemp seeds are a secondary product when collecting hemp plants. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional cloth. A common practice is to plant them immediately after harvesting out in the world so that other new players can get cloth from it later on.

If they are planted in the ground, watering them has no effect, and you are not able to use fertilizer on them. This means that they are lower maintenance, but you have no control over the quality of the soil, so they will typically grow more slowly.

However, if you plant them in a planter box (small or large), they will require you to regularly water them and keep them stocked with fertilizer for maximum growth efficiency. Be careful not to over-water them, or efficiency may go back down a bit. Generally a good amount of water to have is somewhere between 50% and 70% capacity.

The plant needs light to grow, whether from a lamp or the sun. As of May 2020, floor grates do not let light through to the plant, despite looking like they do. This is likely a bug and may be fixed in the future. With the new electric water pump and electric water purifier, it is a good idea to build either on the beach or on a river (with one lower or missing foundation for safe access to water), as you can set up automatic plant watering fairly easily.

-1698937385.name: herring
-1698937385.description: A small fish commonly found in a variety of water sources.

-542577259.name: minnows
-542577259.description: Small fish caught by fish trap

-1962971928.name: mushroom
-1962971928.description: Mushrooms can be found in forest and snow biomes and offer some decent healing properties. Although when eaten they don't provide many calories, they can be found in abundance in brown areas viable in the in-game map. Mushrooms will restore a portion of the consumer's health instantly, making them useful for early-game PvP.

-1904821376.name: orange-roughy
-1904821376.description: A rare fish found in the depths of the ocean. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.

-2084071424.name: potato-seed
-2084071424.description:
These potato seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

-567909622.name: pumpkin
-567909622.description:
The Pumpkin provides a great amount of calories, hydration, and healing compared to the other foods. It can also be worn on your head. When high durability, seeds are dropped when consumed. With the plant giving 3 harvests, they prove to be an easy to farm foodstuff giving massive returns.

Can be found on the sides of streams.

-1511285251.name: pumpkin-seed
-1511285251.description: When planted, the pumpkin plant gives 3 harvests before being unusable. With this, it makes it easy to farm and mass produce, with farms growing exponentially through gameplay.

-33009419.name: pure-anti-rad-tea
-33009419.description: A tea that reduces the amount of health lost due to radiation.

-1677315902.name: pure-healing-tea
-1677315902.description: A tea that restores health over time.

-557539629.name: pure-wood-tea
-557539629.description: A tea that increases the amount of wood you receive from trees.

-496584751.name: rad.-removal-tea
-496584751.description: A tea that removes some radiation.

-1520560807.name: raw-bear-meat
-1520560807.description: Raw Bear Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

-1440987069.name: raw-chicken-breast
-1440987069.description: Raw Chicken Breast is obtained by killing and harvesting a chicken. It is recommended to cook before eating.

-1130350864.name: raw-horse-meat
-1130350864.description: Raw Horse Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

-1709878924.name: raw-human-meat
-1709878924.description: Raw Human Meat is gathered by hitting a dead body with a weapon. it is not recommended to eat unless you cook it in a campfire first.

-395377963.name: raw-wolf-meat
-395377963.description: Raw Wolf Meat. Eating it will damage your health, try cooking it first.

-851988960.name: salmon
-851988960.description: A large Salmon, found in fresh and salt water. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.

-1654233406.name: sardine
-1654233406.description: A small oily fish, commonly found in large schools.

-1768880890.name: small-shark
-1768880890.description: A small, surprisingly aggressive deep sea predator. Eats everything, so you never know what you'll find in it's stomach.

-1878764039.name: small-trout
-1878764039.description: A fish, edible after being gutted and cooked. Obtainable by putting large bait in a fish trap.

-1039528932.name: small-water-bottle
-1039528932.description:
The Water Bottle found in trash piles, and is used for the collection and transportation of drinkable water.

To fill, equip it and right click while looking at a source of water. You can then drink from it whenever you desire with a left click (make sure the water in the bottle is freshwater and not salt/stagnant water).

If the water in the pouch is not desired, or if you are attempting to extinguish a fire (not napalm), you can right click on the bottle again to dump it's contents.

-751151717.name: spoiled-chicken
-751151717.description: Spoiled Chicken. Eating it will damage your health.

-1167031859.name: spoiled-wolf-meat
-1167031859.description: Spoiled Wolf Meat. Consuming will damage your health.

-1003665711.name: super-serum
-1003665711.description: Super Serum, more ore, more wood, more scrap

-119235651.name: water-jug
-119235651.description:
The water jug is an item which carries water and can be held in the players hot-bar or inventory.

The water jug is far superior to the water bucket because of its extra 1,000 ml capacity and its ability to hold water while not in the hands of the user. It is most commonly used in large numbers to carry massive amounts of water to a players base in one trip. It is highly recommended that you have multiple of these items if you plan to have any kind of indoor farm because of the water bonus to farming.

-992286106.name: white-berry-seed
-992286106.description:
These white berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

-520133715.name: yellow-berry-seed
-520133715.description:
These yellow berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

-1685290200.name: 12-gauge-buckshot
-1685290200.description:
12 Gauge Buckshot is a type shotgun ammunition that fires a wide spread of 14 low-damage pellets. Regardless of the weapon it is fired out of, it is extremely lethal in close quarters, capable of one-shotting fully geared players at point-blank.

12 Gauge buckshot has fewer pellets than the Handmade Shell, but makes up for it by doing much more damage with each pellet.

-1036635990.name: 12-gauge-incendiary-shell
-1036635990.description: The 12 gauge incendiary shell is a new shotgun ammunition as of Devblog 198. Once fired, unlike any other shell, it will spew out flaming shotgun projectiles. If stepped on, the player that walks over it will take fire damage. The flame projectile sparks rather than flame when the projectile hit the target.

-727717969.name: 12-gauge-slug
-727717969.description: 12 Gauge Slug is a type of shotgun ammunition that fires a single, high-damage projectile. 12 Gauge Slug is most useful for when the user seeks to significantly extend the range of their shotgun at the cost of decreased lethality in close-quarters and requiring more precise aim to land a hit.

-1211166256.name: 5.56-rifle-ammo
-1211166256.description: Standard high powered ammunition, used by any rifle in the game currently. Offers superior damage, range, accuracy, damage drop off and air resistance from the Pistol Bullet.

-1321651331.name: explosive-5.56-rifle-ammo
-1321651331.description:
A variant of the standard 5.56 rifle ammunition. The Explosive 5.56 round deals a small amount of additional explosion damage to a player upon direct impact as well as damaging nearby structures or players.

The round is effective against low-tier structures such as Wood walls and Sheet Metal doors.

-1691396643.name: hv-pistol-ammo
-1691396643.description:
The high velocity pistol ammo is used by pistols and submachine guns.

Its notable differences from regular pistol ammo include faster bullet travel and increased crafting cost.

-1023065463.name: high-velocity-arrow
-1023065463.description: The high velocity arrow is one of four ammo types for the crossbow, compound bow, and the bow. It can be shot further and faster than the normal arrow, however, it causes less damage.

-1841918730.name: high-velocity-rocket
-1841918730.description: The High Velocity Rocket is essentially a rocket with much less damage than the standard rocket. However, it is also much cheaper, and as the name suggests it has a higher velocity than the standard rocket, so it could be useful for rocketing targets at extreme range. Because of its lower cost and damage, it is useful for situations where a full rocket would be overkill.

-1843426638.name: mlrs-rocket
-1843426638.description: The MLRS Rocket is a projectile for the MLRS, they are found in Locked Crates as well as the MLRS Aiming Module. It has lethal damage to both structures and players. 3 SAM Sites can easily destroy the projectiles.

-2097376851.name: nailgun-nails
-2097376851.description: Early game cheap and easy to acquire ammo for the Nailgun. Has a unique trajectory and velocity that is worse than regular arrows shot from a Hunting Bow, thus giving it a really small effective range. Work best up close and not beyond 10 meters.

-742865266.name: rocket
-742865266.description:
In Rust, rockets are the ammunition for rocket launchers, rockets will cause splash damage that can hit up to 4 walls at once. This type of ammunition is particularly effective against buildings.

In terms of trajectory, rockets are launched forward with a considerable speed upon firing. However, the trajectory eventually falls off due to the in-game gravity effect.

Rockets are currently one of the best tools for raiding and destroying buildings. Rockets are also deadly against players due to its high damage and range of splash damage.

-384243979.name: sam-ammo
-384243979.description: Ammunition for a Sam Site, This missile contains a rudimentary guidance system to help it navigate through strong winds.

-17123659.name: smoke-rocket-wip!!!!
-17123659.description: Currently, smoke rockets in Rust are labeled as WIP (Work In Progress). They do minor poison damage to players or to structures, and provide minimal amounts of quickly disappearing smoke. Though they are cannot currently be crafted or found, admins are able to spawn them in via the console.

-1671551935.name: torpedo
-1671551935.description:
Ammunition for both submarine types. Fires in a straight line. Used to be called Direct Torpedo.

As of September 2021's update, the Surface Torpedo was removed from the game due to players camping underwater with little to no risk. The Direct Torpedo was then renamed to Torpedo.

-1234735557.name: wooden-arrow
-1234735557.description: The Wooden Arrow is one of four ammo types for the crossbow and the bow. It has lower range and velocity than the High Velocity Arrow, but it does more damage compared to it.

-1663759755.name: homemade-landmine
-1663759755.description: A small explosive device which activates when a player steps off the pressure plate. The land mine can be deactivated by a friend by hold 'Use' button (default 'E') on it so that the player can step off safely.

-1009359066.name: sam-site
-1009359066.description:
The SAM Site targets any air vehicles (minicopter, scrap helicopter and hot air balloon, even TC authorized players with air vehicles) in range and shoots SAM ammo at the targeted vehicle. They will also target at MLRS rockets, 3 SAM sites are recommended for maximum MLRS protection.

It is recommended to have a RF Transmitter or a Smart Switch paired on your phone to toggle the SAM site if you have air vehicles.

As of February 2022, the SAM site has a Defender Mode that only targets MLRS rockets but not air vehicles. This allows you to still use your minicopters, but never friendly fired by your own SAM sites.

-582782051.name: snap-trap
-582782051.description:
The Snap Trap is a small anti-personnel trap used to wound a player. The trap can be deactivated for safe passage by hitting/shooting the middle causing the trap to slam shut making it harmless.

They can be picked back up once triggered if you have building privilege.

-92759291.name: wooden-floor-spikes
-92759291.description: The Wooden floor spikes are a basic anti-personnel trap. They are placed on the ground and will slow a player that travels through them as well as inflicting damage.

-484206264.name: blue-keycard
-484206264.description:
The Blue Keycard is a game object required in order to access quite a lot of monument puzzles.
It can be obtained by fishing and gutting high tier fish or by completing green monument puzzles on Harbors, Satellite Dish or Sewer Branch.

List of monuments that require Blue Keycard to finish monument puzzle:
Airfield, Arctic Research Base, Military Tunnels, Missile Silo, Oil Rig, Power Plant, Trainyard, Water Treatment and Underwater Labs.

Large Oil Rig does not require Blue Keycard to access Locked Crate but it grants access to 4 military crates.

-1667224349.name: decorative-baubels
-1667224349.description: Decorative Baubels you can hang on your Christmas tree.

-129230242.name: decorative-pinecones
-129230242.description: Decorative Pinecones you can hang on your Christmas tree.

-209869746.name: decorative-plastic-candy-canes
-209869746.description: Decorative Plastic Candy Canes you can hang on your Christmas tree.

-1112793865.name: door-key
-1112793865.description:
Door keys are used in conjunction with a Key Lock for letting others access (open and close) your door.
Important: the person who places a Key Lock, has access by default, without the need for a door key.

If the key is lost, then the person carrying it won't have access anymore. In addition, if their killer or anyone else loots it from them and are able to locate the base, your base (or the particular door) might be compromised. So overall, carrying door keys outside of your base is risky.

To avoid this risk, it's advised to upgrade to Code Locks if you have multiple people that need to have access to your doors. Using keylocks within groups is really not practical, they are mostly used by solo players.

-1973785141.name: fogger-3000
