-1973785141.description: A Fog machine which runs on low grade fuel. Can be set to fill an area with a dense fog or triggered by motion.

-695124222.name: giant-candy-decor
-695124222.description: Get into the holiday spirit with this decorative inflated giant candy cane.

-1002156085.name: gold-egg
-1002156085.description: A Gold Egg. Containing the best easter loot.

-888153050.name: halloween-candy
-888153050.description: Some loose halloween candy Collect 10 to upgrade to a Small Loot Bat!

-1622660759.name: large-present
-1622660759.description: Large Presents are a consumable, seasonal item that can only be found on the Christmas season. Upon consuming the item the player will be rewarded with high value items

-126305173.name: painted-egg
-126305173.description: Some simple painted eggs. Collect 10 to upgrade to a bronze egg

-1880870149.name: red-keycard
-1880870149.description:
The Red Keycard is game object required in order to access high tier loot in monument puzzles.
It can be obtained by completing blue monument puzzles on Airfield, Arctic Research Base, Missile Silo, Powerplant, Trainyard and Water Treatment.
List of monuments that require Red Keycard to finish monument puzzle:
Large Oil Rig, Launch Site, Military Tunnels, Small Oil Rig and Underwater Lab.

-173268132.name: rustige-egg-blue
-173268132.description: A beautiful hand-crafted egg made of sapphire and white gold. It contains a miniature arrangement of the light house monument and plays a song while open.

-173268125.name: rustige-egg-green
-173268125.description: A beautiful hand crafted gold and green egg, with a miniature traincart contained inside.

-173268126.name: rustige-egg-ivory
-173268126.description: An beautiful hand-crafted egg made of ivory and gold. It contains a miniature arrangement of the satellite dish monument and plays a song while open.

-173268131.name: rustige-egg-purple
-173268131.description: A beautiful hand-crafted egg with gold lace. It contains a miniature arrangement of the oil rig monument (with circling Chinook) and plays a song while open.

-173268129.name: rustige-egg-red
-173268129.description: An exquisite hand-crafted egg made of diamond and gold. It contains a miniature arrangement of the dome monument and plays a song while open.

-173268128.name: rustige-egg-white
-173268128.description: A beautiful hand crafted gold and white egg, with a miniature underwater lab scene contained inside.

-1368584029.name: sickle
-1368584029.description: A very sharp curved cutting weapon. While its traditional role was to cut grass, this tool is also extremely versatile at cutting throats, perhaps trees, too.

-722241321.name: small-present
-722241321.description: A small stocking stuffer present, Collect 10 to upgrade to a larger present.

-1331212963.name: star-tree-topper
-1331212963.description: A golden star to top off your Christmas Tree.

-1615281216.name: armored-passenger-vehicle-module
-1615281216.description: Single module armored seating for two passengers.

-1040518150.name: camper-vehicle-module
-1040518150.description:
The Camper Vehicle Module is a dual module camper that can be fitted into a 3 Module Vehicle or a 4 Module Vehicle (does not come with a cockpit with engine), containing 4 sleeping bags, a barbeque, a locker and a small storage box.

By claiming a bed inside the camper, you can respawn on it and has the same respawn cooldown as the sleeping bag. The locker, barbeque and small storage box can also be used for storage, kits and more. It acts as a portable sleeping bag as you can drive it anywhere and respawn on it (except for safe zones).

-1501451746.name: cockpit-vehicle-module
-1501451746.description: Single module cockpit for a driver and one passenger.

-629028935.name: electric-fuse
-629028935.description: The Electric Fuse is a required item for monument puzzle rooms. It must be placed in the fuse box in order to power the keycard lock. Recycling the electric fuse also gives some quick scrap.

-1673693549.name: empty-propane-tank
-1673693549.description: Tank used in crafting of the flamethrower and water purifier. Also can be recycled as a decent source of metal fragments.

-1899491405.name: glue
-1899491405.description: A sticky white substance that at this point in time has no real functions. Only players with access to the console (i.e Admin, owner, mod) can spawn it.

-1802083073.name: high-quality-valves
-1802083073.description: High quality poppet valves for a combustion engine. Valves control the intake and exhaust flow.

-89874794.name: low-quality-spark-plugs
-89874794.description: Low quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.

-493159321.name: medium-quality-spark-plugs
-493159321.description: Medium quality spark plugs for a combustion engine. Spark plugs ignite the fuel/air mixture to move the pistons.

-1021495308.name: metal-spring
-1021495308.description: An uncommon component used for the construction of almost every gun. It may be found with moderate frequency from crates, and uncommonly from barrels. Generally speaking, guns of higher tiers will require more Metal Springs, while low tier guns (Semi Auto Pistol, Rifle) require only one.

-1994909036.name: sheet-metal
-1994909036.description: An uncommon component that can be recycled into Metal Fragments and High Quality Metal, or used in the crafting of Heavy Plate armor pieces. It can be found in crates and barrels.

-626174997.name: taxi-vehicle-module
-626174997.description: Single module seating for two passengers, with a window and a shop front at the front.

-2139580305.name: auto-turret
-2139580305.description:
The Auto Turret is a placed object used to detect enemies and shoot with its armed weapon. It detects enemies if the enemies were to reach its 180 degrees detection range or shoot the turret. The Auto Turret ignores the Tool Cupboard authorizations and only shoot people not in its authorize list so you and your team must authorize to it manually.

You can arm any ranged weapons onto the Auto Turret and insert the ammo of the equipped weapon. You must turn the turret off in order to refill ammo and weapon slot.

The Auto Turret can be turned on if the Power In slot is powering at least 10 rWm. There are 3 extra slots (Has Target, Low Ammo, No Ammo) that you can set up with Smart Alarm or traps, you must have 11 rWm for the Auto Turret to power the 3 slots. As an example, if someone walks into the detection range of the Auto Turret, 1 rWm will be used up to power out the Has Target slot.

The Auto Turret has 2 modes, Peacekeeper and Attack All. By default, Attack All mode makes the turret targets unauthorized players. Peacekeeper mode only shoots hostile players that has the red sight icon on the top right corner, it works just like the Outpost turrets and Bandit Camp turrets.

-690968985.name: blocker
-690968985.description: This object prevents passthrough while power is received through its second input.

-1778897469.name: button
-1778897469.description: If pressed on, Output sends power for a few seconds and deactivates itself. Works like a timer with no ability to change the time.

-1588628467.name: computer-station
-1588628467.description: The Computer Station can be used for real-time surveillance by pairing with any available CCTV Cameras. There are specific monuments with indestructible CCTV Cameras, the IDs are static and cannot be changed.

-216999575.name: counter
-216999575.description: A basic cathode ray tube screen combined with an incremental counter. Can display power received, or can count upwards and allow passthrough when a target is reached.

-151387974.name: deluxe-christmas-lights
-151387974.description: Colored, Animated, Powered Lights. Requires 5 electricity. Click to start placement, right click to end. Each unit is 0.5m long.

-502177121.name: door-controller
-502177121.description: A Door Controller. Will manipulate the state of the closest door when it recieves power.

-1196547867.name: electric-furnace
-1196547867.description: An electrical version of a furnace that uses electricity instead of a fuel source.

-784870360.name: electric-heater
-784870360.description:
The Electric Heater is very useful for bases on snow biome, it will completely remove the "TOO COLD" status and provide 50% "COMFORT" status when nearby, thus regenerating your health.

It can also be placed nearby plants to provide 100% temperature. However, placing electric heater in desert biome may downgrade the temperature of plants. This can also apply to players.

-1448252298.name: electrical-branch
-1448252298.description: This object allows you to branch power off from a main line by a set amount.

-265292885.name: fluid-combiner
-265292885.description: Combines three separate fluid connections into one connection.

-1166712463.name: fluid-splitter
-1166712463.description: Splits a fluid connection into three separate connections.

-1507239837.name: hbhf-sensor
-1507239837.description: A Hearbeat, Breathing, Humidity and Footstep sensor. Passthrough is equal to the number of humans detected in a roughly 3.6 squares radius with line of sight. Configurable with hammer.

-44876289.name: igniter
-44876289.description: Ignites nearby objects such as furnaces and campfires when power is received

-798293154.name: laser-detector
-798293154.description: A gate which allows power to flow while a player is in the beam.

-746647361.name: memory-cell
-746647361.description: A 1 bit storage component. The SET Input will set the value to 1. The RESET Input sets the value to 0. Output will pass connected power if value is 1, Inverted Output will pass connected power if value is 0. This is also known as a D-Type Flip Flop.

-1286302544.name: or-switch
-1286302544.description: A logic gate that allows eletrical passthrough if EITHER input receives power, passthrough amount is the greater of either power source.

-144513264.name: pipe-tool
-144513264.description: A tool used to make connections between industrial objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle, then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection. Holding right mouse will clear or cancel a connection.

-365097295.name: powered-water-purifier
-365097295.description: A device that converts salt water to fresh water while powered.

-2049214035.name: pressure-pad
-2049214035.description: A gate which allows power to flow while a player is standing on it.

-1044468317.name: rf-broadcaster
-1044468317.description: The RF Broadcaster is a electric component that sends out a signal at a frequency. It is possible to make a trap with the RF Broadcaster.

-566907190.name: rf-pager
-566907190.description: An RF Pager. An audible tone will be produced when a signal is picked up on the listening frequency. Can be set to silent mode.

-1736356576.name: reactive-target
-1736356576.description: Reactive Targets are handy for practicing your marksmanship without chasing around those slippery newmans. After sustaining enough damage, they fall backwards and reset after a few seconds.

-1160621614.name: red-industrial-wall-light
-1160621614.description: The Red Industrial Wall Light has the same function as the White Industrial Wall but emits a red light.

-458565393.name: root-combiner
-458565393.description: This object combines two root electrical sources into a single signal. Helpful for stringing together low energy batteries or solar panels to produce higher power output.

-948291630.name: seismic-sensor
-948291630.description: A small device that detects vibrations within a set range. Will output a different power value depending on the explosive type detected, ideal to know when your time has come.

-692338819.name: small-rechargeable-battery
-692338819.description: A small rechargable battery. Must have a minimum charge of 5 seconds to discharge. Can be wired in series. Charging rate is dependant on power in, with a maximum of 80% efficiency.

-695978112.name: smart-alarm
-695978112.description: Sends a notifications to your phone when powered on.

-563624462.name: splitter
-563624462.description: Splits an electrical signal into 3 multiple signals. the amount passed through is equal to the input amount divided by the number of used output slots.

-781014061.name: sprinkler
-781014061.description: A small sprinkler that sprays water around it. Requires a hose connection to supply it with water.

-1049172752.name: storage-adaptor
-1049172752.description: Attach to a storage container to allow industrial input/output connections.

-295829489.name: test-generator
-295829489.description:
The Test Generator is most known for debugging with electrical stuff. It will always generate 100 power and can be placed anywhere.

It is unobtainable through normal gameplay and can only be obtained by admins.

-1284169891.name: water-pump
-1284169891.description: Can be placed in a water source to collect that water while powered. Can be connected to other Water entities.

-1819763926.name: wind-turbine
-1819763926.description: Converts kinetic energy harvested from the wind into electricity. Amount generated will vary depending on wind speed. Higher altitudes will yield stronger winds.

-144417939.name: wire-tool
-144417939.description:
A tool used to make connections between electrical objects.

To use the Wire Tool, aim at an electrical object to highlight the available inputs and outputs (connections). Press the LMB to attach wires to these connections (wires can clip through any item). To disconnect a wired connection, highlight the connection and hold RMB. Wired connections can be disconnected with RMB while simultaneously holding a wire to then be connected. Electrical components will automatically grey out connections that cannot be paired based on their type (input vs output). Hold R to view wire color wheel.

-2124352573.name: acoustic-guitar
-2124352573.description: The acoustic guitar can be played with different notes using mouse 1 and 2, and at a variable pitch relative to where the player is looking on the vertical plane.

-321431890.name: beach-chair
-321431890.description: The Beach Chair is the best way to relax, whether it's by the pool or on the beach.

-1621539785.name: beach-parasol
-1621539785.description: A large umbrella that will shield you from the sun.

-8312704.name: beach-towel
-8312704.description: A colourful beach towel. Placing this will give you a location to respawn.

-515830359.name: blue-roman-candle
-515830359.description: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Blue balls into the air

-1478094705.name: boogie-board
-1478094705.description: Use the boogie board to catch some sick waves.

-1113501606.name: boom-box
-1113501606.description: A large speaker to play recorded cassette tapes which can also stream audio from the internet. Open the settings to change audio options.

-1379036069.name: canbourine
-1379036069.description: A selection of crumpled cans assembled into a ring to produce some great background percussion.

-912398867.name: cassette-medium
-912398867.description: A tape that you can record audio on to using a Cassette Recorder. Stores up to 20s of audio.

-1530414568.name: cassette-recorder
-1530414568.description: Insert a cassette and play the recorded audio with [attack], [attack2] to record new audio and [+reload] to throw.

-1049881973.name: cowbell
-1049881973.description: A road sign that's been repurposed to produce some beautiful, calming, percussion.

-656349006.name: green-boomer
-656349006.description: A very large mortar type firework with a green starburst

-1306288356.name: green-roman-candle
-1306288356.description: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Green balls into the air

-697981032.name: inner-tube
-697981032.description: An inflated tube for aquatic activities.

-979951147.name: jerry-can-guitar
-979951147.description: Take advantage of the unique acoustics of the Jerry Can Guitar to play some rustic tunes.

-1330640246.name: junkyard-drum-kit
-1330640246.description: An array of pots, pans and buckets that passes as a serviceable Drum Kit. Three cymbals, some Tom Drums and a Kick Drum means you can easily lay down a beat.

-583379016.name: megaphone
-583379016.description: A megaphone that lets you broadcast your voice. [attack] to activate your voice.

-20045316.name: mobile-phone
-20045316.description: A mobile phone that lets you place calls from anywhere. Truly cutting edge Cobalt technology. Use [attack] to access the dialler.

-961457160.name: new-year-gong
-961457160.description: Ring in the Lunar new year with a massive gong!

-7270019.name: orange-boomer
-7270019.description: A very large mortar type firework with an orange starburst

-733625651.name: paddling-pool
-733625651.description: A small inflatable pool that you can fill up with water.

-2040817543.name: pan-flute
-2040817543.description: A set of repurposed PVC pipes that can be used to play a variety of melodies.

-379734527.name: pattern-boomer
-379734527.description: A special boomer which allows you light up the night sky with a custom pattern that you draw. Multiple colors and altitude settings are available.

-1553999294.name: red-boomer
-1553999294.description: A very large mortar type firework with a red starburst

-1486461488.name: red-roman-candle
-1486461488.description: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of red balls into the air

-454370658.name: red-volcano-firework
-454370658.description: Emits a beautiful shower of red sparks

-2107018088.name: shovel-bass
-2107018088.description: Use this stringed together shovel to play some deep, deep tunes.

-1073015016.name: skull-spikes
-1073015016.description: A spike of several skulls. Very spooky.

-769647921.name: skull-trophy
-769647921.description: A decorative mount that can hold the skull of a friend or foe.

-333406828.name: sled
-333406828.description: A wooden sled to quickly travel down snowy hills.

-343857907.name: sound-light
-343857907.description: A light that will pulse in time to music when connected to a Boom Box.

-280223496.name: violet-boomer
-280223496.description: A very large mortar type firework with a violet starburst

-99886070.name: violet-roman-candle
-99886070.description: A small repeating firework, shoots a series of Violet balls into the air

-1538109120.name: violet-volcano-firework
-1538109120.description: Emits a beautiful shower of Violet sparks

-211235948.name: xylobone
-211235948.description: A selection of bones that were acquired for their acoustic attributes. Play a lullaby for your camp with these soothing tones.
